job_title: Senior Software Engineer in Artificial Intelligence
job_text: ['A strong software engineer who enjoys building and improving complex, large-scale systems. You like writing testable and maintainable code. You are autonomous: you know whether your time is best spent thinking about the architecture or writing a tool that helps you get the job done. You want to join a close-knit group and make a big impact. ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence ', 'Who are you?', '\xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills ', '\xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them ', "We'd love to see:", '\xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing ', "You'll need to have:", "We'll trust you to:", 'New York, NY - USA', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code \xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients \xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', '\xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java ', '\xa0Improve our SDLC processes ', ' ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) \xa0Strong Linux/UNIX skills \xa0Experience designing and using relational databases \xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems \xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', "We are looking for an experienced Software Engineer to join our rapidly growing Artificial Intelligence team.\xa0News and social media move financial markets.\xa0 We are one of the largest producers of news in the world and ingests over 70,000 external news feeds and social media like Twitter each day. This data keeps our clients informed, and our team's insights help make sense of it for our customers. ", '\xa0Work in a fast-paced and agile environment to deliver high-quality features to our clients ', '\xa05+ years of software development experience ', 'New York, NY - USA ', 'Senior Software Engineer - Artificial Intelligence', "\xa05+ years of software development experience \xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field \xa0Experience building large-scale software systems: developing, testing, and maintaining them \xa0Experience with multithreading and distributed computing \xa0Strong coding skills in one or more of: C/C++, Python, Java \xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN \xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ", 'Who are we?', '\xa0Experience designing and using relational databases ', '\xa0In-depth knowledge of toolchains (build systems, compilers, linkers, interpreters, debuggers, profilers) ', '\xa0Write, test and maintain production-quality code ', 'Our Artificial Intelligence (AI) group: researchers and engineers who have a passion for solving complex problems. Our charter: to extract relevant, meaningful, tradable, and actionable information (pricings, earnings, recommendations and major events) from data (news, web, social media, and structured data) in real-time. Since our customers rely on this information to make swift financial decisions, we guarantee precision, accuracy and latency beyond most academic and industry standards. ', "\xa0Bachelor's degree or higher in a Computer Science or related field ", '\xa0Experience with version control tools such as Git and SVN ', '\xa0Knowledge of artificial intelligence, machine learning, or natural language processing', 'Help us improve our low-latency, high-volume pipeline, which carries two million news stories and half a billion tweets daily. You will integrate new functionality, such as supporting more document formats and publishing the output of our AI systems to more downstream listeners. You will improve the speed and reliability of the existing pipeline. ', '\xa0Interest in building and maintaining Machine Learning applications. Experience is a plus! ', '\xa0Experience building and maintaining large-scale systems ']

job_text: ['', 'You Will', 'Collaborate by nature. We believe a team is bigger than the sum of its parts.', 'Collaborate with partners to build and enrich the ecosystem around Auth0 products and platforms.', 'Debug production issues across multiple levels of our stack.', 'Monitor distributed systems that need to communicate well and maintain high availability.', 'Polyglot and have knowledge of Go and other programming languages.', 'Evaluate new technologies and techniques to improve overall practices.', 'Improve the reliability, monitoring, and operations of our serverless platform.', 'Design, build, and maintain extensibility solutions for internal and external services.', '#US; #AR; #CA; ', 'Have attention to detail and make user experience a top priority.', 'Have experience engineering web applications, working closely with the front-end.', 'Have a history of developing and supporting intuitive and robust extensibility solutions.Are familiar with the challenges and approaches for designing interconnected, scalable systems.Have familiarity with the tools we currently use, such as Node.js, React, and AWS. (We always try to use the best tool for the job, and therefore regard general engineering skills over knowledge of a particular language or tool).Polyglot and have knowledge of Go and other programming languages.Have experience working in a global remote-first organization.', 'Are familiar with Node.js and RESTful APIs.', 'Have a deep understanding of JavaScript and TypeScript.', "You'd Be An Excellent Fit If You", 'Are familiar with the challenges and approaches for designing interconnected, scalable systems.', 'Preferred Locations: ', 'Are able to balance idealism and pragmatism in a dynamic work environment.', 'Are remote-by-design. Work from anywhere, your office is The Internet (but we also have multiple physical locations around the world).', 'Are remote-by-design. Work from anywhere, your office is The Internet (but we also have multiple physical locations around the world).Obsess about delivering customer value. Everything we do assumes we only succeed if our customers do.Trust and respect each other. Building a new product is like hacking a new path through the jungle. We’ve got your back. We expect the same from you. We respect our differences and use them to our advantage.Hold ourselves to high standards. We take pride in work done well, and constantly push ourselves towards personal betterment.Collaborate by nature. We take pride in work done well, and constantly push ourselves towards personal betterment.', 'Trust and respect each other. Building a new product is like hacking a new path through the jungle. We’ve got your back. We expect the same from you. ', 'Collaborate with cross-discipline team members from multiple teams.', 'Design, build, and maintain extensibility solutions for internal and external services.Debug production issues across multiple levels of our stack.Monitor distributed systems that need to communicate well and maintain high availability.Improve the reliability, monitoring, and operations of our serverless platform.Evaluate new technologies and techniques to improve overall practices.Collaborate with cross-discipline team members from multiple teams.Collaborate with partners to build and enrich the ecosystem around Auth0 products and platforms.', 'Have experience engineering web applications, working closely with the front-end.Are familiar with Node.js and RESTful APIs.Have a deep understanding of JavaScript and TypeScript.Have attention to detail and make user experience a top priority.Place a high value on security.Take an iterative approach to development, dividing long-term goals into incremental milestones.Are able to balance idealism and pragmatism in a dynamic work environment.Possess self-management skills with a continuous improvement mindset and thrive in a collaborative and fast-paced environment.']

['• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Build connectors to a wide array of data sources guided by advanced data integration patterns ', 'We offer a competitive salary, 401(k) and benefits. You will also receive an equity stake in the company. You will have a flexible work environment with the freedom and resources to do your best work.', 'Senior Software Engineer', 'Location ', 'Senior Software Engineer ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 BS degree or above in Computer Science, Engineering, Math, Physics or related fields ', 'Salary/Benefits/Equity ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with data stores and data-related open source tools (Kafka required) ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience in distributed systems, system scalability/reliability, network security a plus ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience maintaining client and vendor relationship a plus ', 'Requirements', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Connect and create APIs to enable technical support with tools that quicken the time to resolve issues that arise at various stages of the data pipeline ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Build a data validation and error handling system based on requirements from investment process ', 'Job description', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Extend capabilities of open source data tools to provide added functionality for scalability, responsiveness, orchestration, and monitoring ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Mentor junior developers ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience integrating outside services into a data pipeline ', 'The opportunity', 'The person', 'Our Data Engineering firm was formed by an experienced management team, with successful prior exits, and backed by a few of the world’s largest hedge funds, to solve some of the most challenging problems in data analytics and data-driven insights. Because of our strong backers, who are both investors and potential customers, we are well funded and able to build exciting solutions with full collaboration from our intended end users – a privileged position to be in, where you will enjoy the best of the startup life and stability uncommon for ordinary startups. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience building a data pipeline, and experience with ETL highly preferred ', ' ', 'Candidate must be based or willing to relocate to the NYC Tri-State area. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 At least 3 years of professional experience programming in Java, Python, or other OOP languages ', 'The opportunity ', 'The person ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Demonstrated record of meeting deadlines ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Work with data analysts to integrate configuration schemas into system processes ', 'Job description ', 'This position will offer an attractive salary, a substantial stock grant, and a significant upside in terms of career growth and influence. For the right person, this is a once in a lifetime opportunity. ', 'Technically, you will be one of the principals responsible for architecting and building a new platform by leveraging a wide variety of technologies and services, including cloud providers like AWS. You will deliver a solution capable of processing large volumes of heterogenous data, to provide analytics and insights to aid with research, investment and operations. ', 'Location', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Build a monitoring system that handles a variety of specific business logic ', 'Requirements ', 'Salary/Benefits/Equity', 'You have a positive attitude and embody a balance of cautiousness, that serious software engineering requires, and pushing the envelope, which a startup needs to do. You are an excellent team player and aim to bring out the best in those around you. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Excellent verbal/written communications ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with financial data sets ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with Linux, relational databases ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 At least 2 years of software project management experience ', 'We are seeking a rare kind of individual, who can zoom out to the big picture, both from a technical architecture, and from a technical strategy perspective, and zoom in to details of the implementation while fussing over the code quality, hygiene, and maintainability. You will be one of the key team members responsible for setting standards, culture, mentorship of other team members, and shipping high quality solutions. You aim to bring clarity and energy to the team, and to your work environment. ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Experience with integration platforms like Talend, Pentaho highly preferred ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Previous work with AWS ecosystem ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Develop systems to manage and make use of meta data generated in the data ingestion process ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Previous work with Kibana, Logstash, and Elasticsearch a plus ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Present progress reports to stakeholders ', '• \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 \xa0 Enforce strict compliance and security requirements informed by our customers and best practices ', '\xa0 ']

', 'Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. ', 'Performing quantitative research, analysis and development on\xa0\xa0Group’s electronic/algorithmic execution trading systems. Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. The research tasks involve developing research plans, extensive data analysis (usually with large amounts of data on orders, trades and market data) and documenting outcomes as reports and white papers. The development tasks require writing robust software using good design principles and follow practices like continuous integration for efficient development cycles. ', 'Use statistical/mathematical techniques and knowledge of US equity market structure (and microstructure) to design new trading algorithms and systems, and improve existing ones, with the goal of providing ‘best execution’ on client orders executed thru our systems. ', 'Strong object oriented design and programming skills using Java (or similar object oriented programming language) is required, with good knowledge of using efficient data structures. ', 'This position is integrated into the development team and responsible for research and development around algorithm strategies, pricing signals, and TCA.  The position also will work with salespeople and clients to explain and customize our execution offering. ', 'Bachelor or a Master’s degree in Computer Science, with an advanced degree in a quantitative field like Statistics, Financial Mathematics, Operations Research, Machine Learning, or a directly related field. 2-5 years of experience in software development and 1-3 years in quantitative analysis (statistical analysis - regression analysis, time series analysis and/or machine learning). Strong object oriented design and programming skills using Java (or similar object oriented programming language) is required, with good knowledge of using efficient data structures. Experience working with data/statistical analysis software like Excel, R and Matlab, and familiarity with data visualization tools and techniques. Experience researching large data sets related to trading (tick/market data, orders and trades) is a plus. Knowledge of equity market micro-structure and TCA techniques is a plus. Candidate should be self-motivated, and have the ability to communicate complex ideas clearly and work well in a collaborative team environment. ['', "We are proud to be our engineers; 'engineers' and love voiding warranties by taking things apart so we can rebuild them.", 'Hope is not a strategy. Engineering solutions to design, build, and maintain efficient large-scale systems is a true strategy, and a good one. Site Reliability Engineering is an engineering discipline that combines software and systems engineering to build and run large-scale massively distributed, fault-tolerant systems. Practices such as limiting time spent on operational work, blameless postmortems and proactive identification of potential outages factor into iterative improvement that is key to both product quality and interesting and dynamic day-to-day work. Our culture of diversity, intellectual curiosity, problem solving and openness is key to our success. Our organization brings together people with a wide variety of backgrounds, experiences and perspectives. We encourage our teams to collaborate, think big and take risks in a blame-free environment. We promote self-direction to work on meaningful projects, while we also strive to create an environment that provides the support and mentorship needed to learn and grow.', 'Qualifications', '\uf0b7 Experience with AWS Tools', 'We use next-generation technology and alpha-driven strategies to transform the global economy. We tackle some of the toughest problems in the industry by pushing ourselves to be the best again and again. It’s demanding work for the brightest minds, but we wouldn’t have it any other way.', '\uf0b7 Experience in designing, analyzing, and troubleshooting large-scale distributed systems', 'We are seeking talented engineers skilled in the art of integration who understand the Agile mindset and Site Reliability Engineering philosophies, yet, not constrained by how “things are usually done; and are willing to decompose and reinvent systems, processes, and tools. We are looking for passionate engineers to build some of the largest compute services on the planet; if you possess that rare mix of depth in Development, Operations, Networking, and Systems Engineering then we are waiting for your application.', "\uf0b7 Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering", '\uf0b7 Experience in configuration management and infrastructure provisioning', '\uf0b7 Programming in Python and Linux']

['Saratoga Springs, NY ', ' ', 'Qualifications', 'Overview ', 'Responsibilities ', ' Overview With a 40-year history in the areas of financial planning, education and investment services,  Our company develops and assists in implementing holistic financial solutions to help our clients achieve their goals. We believe in the power for human relationships to drive action, and a career with us offers an opportunity to be part of this unique culture of client service. We invest in our associates, care about professional development, and believe in creating many paths of opportunity. Through our supportive, diverse and innovative environment, Our company is committed to the success of our associates.\xa0 ', 'Senior Software Engineer (Java Lead)', 'Preferred Qualifications', "Our Engineers are innovators and problem-solvers, building solutions in risk management, big data, mobile and more. We look for creative collaborators who evolve, adapt to change and thrive in a fast-paced global environment.Responsibilities • \xa0 \xa0You are energetic, self-directed and self-motivated, able to build and sustain long-term relationships with clients and colleagues• \xa0 \xa0You approach problem solving with an open mind within the context of a team• \xa0 \xa0You have exceptional analytical skills, able to apply knowledge and experience in decision-making to arrive at creative and commercial solutions• \xa0 \xa0You possess a strong desire to learn and contribute solutions and ideas to a broad team• \xa0 \xa0You are independent and comfortable in a fast paced, ambiguous and often multi-directional work environments• \xa0 \xa0You collaborate with globally-located cross functional team in building customer-centric products• \xa0 \xa0You analyze existing software implementations to identify areas of improvement and provide estimates for implementing new features• \xa0 \xa0You follow standard software development guidelines and best practices• \xa0 \xa0You create and maintain test plans, documentation and automated testing routines for all technical changes• \xa0 \xa0You grow technical skillset by seeking out cross-training and knowledge advancement opportunitiesQualifications• \xa0 \xa0Bachelor's degree with a concentration in Computer Science or related field• \xa0 \xa04+ years of experience with Java\xa0or other related Object Oriented development language• \xa0 \xa0Experience with Javascript frameworks (Angular, Typescript, ReactJS)• \xa0 \xa0Web development experience with HTML5, CSS3• \xa0 \xa0Experience writing SQL queries• \xa0 \xa0Strong written and verbal communication skills• \xa0 \xa0Ability to establish trusted partnerships with product heads\xa0Preferred Qualifications• \xa0 \xa0Basic knowledge of XML and JSON• \xa0 \xa0Source Control Management systems (i.e., SVN, Git)• \xa0 \xa0An understanding of common application architecture design patterns (i.e., MVC, MVVM)• \xa0 \xa0Experience working in an Agile environment"]

['', 'Active DOD Secret Clearance', 'The tailored Agile software development process includes understanding software requirements and use cases, designing software architectures and user interfaces, implementing source code to design specifications, testing developed software to include unit tests, and updating software documentation as appropriate. Additionally, the position requires the ability to analyze, debug, and correct reported issues and enhancements.', 'A successful candidate must possess strong software development skills throughout the software development life cycle and work well in a collaborative team environment.', 'Qualifications', 'Active DOD Secret ClearanceBA/BS, 5+ years experience, or related experienceOnsite in Dayton, Ohio', 'Researches, designs, develops, and/or modifies enterprise-wide systems and/or applications software.', 'The targeting and situational awareness software suite is developed and tested using a tailored Agile development methodology with two week sprints. Due to the ultra-collaborative nature of the development, the position offers tremendous opportunity to further grow and evolve development and testing skills.', 'This position offers the opportunity to develop capabilities within an existing software architecture for users that truly make a difference.The tailored Agile software development process includes understanding software requirements and use cases, designing software architectures and user interfaces, implementing source code to design specifications, testing developed software to include unit tests, and updating software documentation as appropriate. Additionally, the position requires the ability to analyze, debug, and correct reported issues and enhancements.A successful candidate must possess strong software development skills throughout the software development life cycle and work well in a collaborative team environment.The targeting and situational awareness software suite is developed and tested using a tailored Agile development methodology with two week sprints. Due to the ultra-collaborative nature of the development, the position offers tremendous opportunity to further grow and evolve development and testing skills.The software targets both Android and Windows platforms, with Java and C++ being the primary development languages. The Android software is integrated with the ATAK software suite while the Windows solution integrates with WinTAK.Researches, designs, develops, and/or modifies enterprise-wide systems and/or applications software.', 'This position offers the opportunity to develop capabilities within an existing software architecture for users that truly make a difference.', 'BA/BS, 5+ years experience, or related experience', 'Onsite in Dayton, Ohio', 'Software Engineer', 'The software targets both Android and Windows platforms, with Java and C++ being the primary development languages. The Android software is integrated with the ATAK software suite while the Windows solution integrates with WinTAK.']

['Interest / expertise in user experience design ', '\xa0', 'Bonus points if you have any of the following: ', 'Have experience scaling UI development patterns and libraries to large applications and organizations Interest / expertise in user experience design Experience with ES6, SASS, or Webpack Experience building healthcare applications Contribute to open source projects Have taken a leading role in delivering complex software systems all the way to production', 'You are inspired by our mission to improve healthcare through technology ', 'Who you are: ', 'Experience building healthcare applications ', 'Contribute to open source projects ', 'You seek simple approaches to complex problems ', "Are you passionate about using modern web technologies to enable clinical workflows and help customers visualize their data? As a Full Stack Engineer, you will craft intuitive web interfaces to make complex data accessible and useful through extensive web-based applications that improve oncologists' complex workflows so that they can focus on their patients. ", 'Today, our Health OncologyCloud™ platform includes the industry-leading electronic medical record for oncology (OncoEMR), a first-of-its-kind analytics tool, patient portal, and integrated billing management. Our goal is to help cancer centers and life science companies leverage real-world oncology data at a scale and clinical depth never before seen, to advance cancer care and accelerate research. ', 'You have strong Javascript experience and have “gone deep” with at least one modern front-end framework like React/Angular/Vue ', 'Our mission is to serve cancer patients and our customers by dramatically improving treatment and accelerating research. Our team is building a disruptive, oncology-specific software platform that connects cancer centers across the world on a common technology infrastructure to address key healthcare challenges. ', 'You are interested in user-research-driven design where shaving one second off of a workflow matters ', 'You hold a BS, MS, or Ph.D. in computer science or related field You have over 4 years experience You have strong Javascript experience and have “gone deep” with at least one modern front-end framework like React/Angular/Vue You are interested in user-research-driven design where shaving one second off of a workflow matters You are passionate about crafting fluid, usable, and accessible UIs, and making it easier for other engineers to do the same You enjoy full stack development but are most excited about the front end You are inspired by our mission to improve healthcare through technology You seek simple approaches to complex problems ', 'Have experience scaling UI development patterns and libraries to large applications and organizations ', 'Who you are:', 'Bonus points if you have any of the following:', 'You are passionate about crafting fluid, usable, and accessible UIs, and making it easier for other engineers to do the same ', 'You enjoy full stack development but are most excited about the front end ', 'You hold a BS, MS, or Ph.D. in computer science or related field ', 'You have over 4 years experience ', 'Experience with ES6, SASS, or Webpack ', 'Have taken a leading role in delivering complex software systems all the way to production', '\xa0 ']

job_text: ['', ' Desire to stay educated on current technology trends.', 'Required Attributes', ' Comfortable working with a diverse set of contractors and customer personnel across multiple site locations.', ' Experience with Elasticsearch, micro-services, Docker, Spring', ' Experience developing and delivering software on Amazon Web Services (AWS) or similar cloud services using Infrastructure as Code.', ' Software development experience in Groovy, Java', ' Support the entire product lifecycle to include systems engineering and requirement analysis, technical design, system integration, implementation and deployment.', ' Ability to work independently and within a distributed team environment. Strong written and verbal communications skills. Desire to stay educated on current technology trends.', " Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or a related major", ' Experience with Agile software development methodologies', ' Ability to work in a highly collaborative, open, and unclassified office work environment.', 'Clearance', ' Strong knowledge of Linux, System Administration, and its deployment in virtual environments.', ' CI/CD pipeline experience using GitLab or Jenkins.', ' Experience with automated test tools and frameworks, e.g. Inspec, Selenium, Cucumber, Junit.', ' A minimum of 10 years of related work experience.', ' Ability to work independently and within a distributed team environment.', ' CI/CD pipeline experience using GitLab or Jenkins. Experience with automated test tools and frameworks, e.g. Inspec, Selenium, Cucumber, Junit.', 'These Qualifications Would Be Nice To Have', 'You’ll Bring These Qualifications', 'What You’ll Get To Do', ' Use of industry proven design patterns and open source tools is encouraged, along with a dedication to staying educated on current technology trends.', ' This is a clearance sponsorship position, which means no clearance is required initially but must be obtainable. ", 'What You Provide ', 'What We Provide ', "Balance. We don't expect people to work 12 hour days. We want you to have a successful time outside of work too. Want to work from home sometimes? No problem. We trust our colleagues to be responsible with their time and commitment, and believe that balance helps cultivate a positive environment. ", "Are you interested in being part of a small team tasked to build the next-generation industry-leading platform for machine data? We are building a new foundation for Cloud offerings. Utilizing some of the most modern tools available, such as Kubernetes and Go, this is an excellent opportunity to impact the effort to define and build the future of our company. You will be joining a team that's developing both the engine that drives our machine-data platform as well as the infrastructure to run and scale it. ", 'A set of talented and dedicated peers, all the way from engineering and QA to product management and customer support. ', 'A stable, collaborative and supportive work environment. We work in an open environment, have a shared kitchen and sit down for a quick sync every morning. ', 'Growth and mentorship. We believe in growing engineers through ownership and leadership opportunities. We also believe mentors help both sides of the equation. ', "We give our engineers an environment in which they can contribute from day one while also providing opportunities for learning and growth. You'll learn how our entire stack works - from data ingestion and storage to searching, reporting and building dashboards – all in distributed environments. The work you’ll do will directly impact the experience of our customers. ", 'What You Provide', 'Opportunities to develop and grow as an engineer - We are the forefront of our industry, always expanding into new areas, and working with open source and new technologies ', "Desire to Learn and Adapt. Our customers are passionateand we want the same from our engineers. We want you to actively own your work and be excited about your projects. Understanding of Systems Programming. Examples of area you may be knowledgeable in may include how threads work, understanding of filesystems, server and kernel architectures, good grasp of data structures and algorithms, etc. You don't need to be an expert, but you should have foundation to build on. Experience with Cloud and Containers. You have experience in writing software and operationalizing it for deployment to Cloud services, and you've worked with the container ecosystem using tools like Docker, ECS and Kubernetes. Ability to work with multiple programming languages. We have code in several languages, ranging from C/C++ and Go to Python and JavaScript. Experience with all of these is not required - just the ability to work across different ones.", "Experience with Cloud and Containers. ', 'Familiarity with Python, Perl or UNIX shell scripting; ', 'Familiarity with persistent messaging, such as MQ, Kafka; ', '3+ years C++ programming in a Linux or other recent UNIX O/S; ', '3+ years C++ programming in a Linux or other recent UNIX O/S; Multi-threading, multi-process, distributed/parallel programming, UNIX IPC; Good design/architecture skills for large-scale systems; Excellent analytical, problem solving skills; Familiarity with SDLC tools in a CI/CD environment, such as GITHub, Coverity, Jenkins, graphical debuggers, etc. A minimum of a Bachelor’s degree in Software Engineering or another Engineering-related technology field; ', 'Jenkins, Google Test/Mock, Pytest, Splunk, Grafana; ', 'Management roles exist in the future – if that’s something you’d be interested in; ', 'Be self-motivated, to garner the necessary skills & knowledge to complete your assigned projects successfully; ', 'We’d love to see:', 'Familiarity with SDLC tools in a CI/CD environment, such as GITHub, Coverity, Jenkins, graphical debuggers, etc. ', 'Collaborate with other engineers, business managers, sharing your expertise, and leverage from the experience of seasoned peers; ', 'Good design/architecture skills for large-scale systems; ', 'In-depth exposure to developing systems for all the company’s electronic trading clients; Become an expert in architecting and constructing high-performance, nimble, scalable software solutions, using industry-standard technology; Management roles exist in the future – if that’s something you’d be interested in; ', 'Linux-C++ Senior Software Engineer New York, NY - USA\xa0Our software team implements world-class software solutions for our Financial Information eXchange (FIX) engine. These applications operate in a HA environment, servicing our electronic trading broker-dealers around the globe. The SLAs set by our High-Frequency/algorithmic Trading clients mean that our FIX Engine must exceed high-performance, low-latency benchmarks. To ensure privacy and secure connectivity, we use industry standard encryption protocols, such as AES, for all electronic trading communications.\xa0Join our growing team of developers, innovate our cluster-based software solution, and architect our upcoming cloud-based offering. FIX is the industry standard for electronic trading communications: capitalize on this opportunity, using the skills from this position to propel your software engineering career into the future of the electronic trading.\xa0What’s in it for you: ', 'In-depth exposure to developing systems for all the company’s electronic trading clients; ', 'What’s in it for you:', 'Knowledge of TLS/SSL Encryption, Open SSL; ', 'Drive your own software solutions, from inception to production release; Be self-motivated, to garner the necessary skills & knowledge to complete your assigned projects successfully; Collaborate with other engineers, business managers, sharing your expertise, and leverage from the experience of seasoned peers; ', 'Excellent analytical, problem solving skills; ', 'We’ll trust you to:', 'Multi-threading, multi-process, distributed/parallel programming, UNIX IPC; ', 'You’ll need to have:', 'Machine learning background; ', 'Become an expert in architecting and constructing high-performance, nimble, scalable software solutions, using industry-standard technology; ']

['The Data is being adopted by technology teams across the Firm at a very high rate. As a result the platform is still growing and evolving. As a developer on the Data team, you will work with the latest technologies such as Apache Spark, Kafka, Elastic Search, and Akka to build complex distributed applications to handle large data sets. ', 'Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including experience working directly with both technical and non-technical stakeholders', 'All roles in Data Architecture offer the opportunity to work Directly with various senior stakeholder across Technology Division and their Business sponsors. Participate in design, build out, and maintenance of a distributed, multi-region, scalable, resilient platform. Collaborate with core engineering consumers and the BU aligned development community at large to analyze and resolve escalations. You will collect requirements, and assess technical feasibility of their requests of your clients and adjacent technology platforms Your clients’ background range from very technical engineers, to more functional and business facing analysts and managers. Partner with other engineering teams to understand technology offerings and how they can be applied and leveraged as part of our solutions. The Data is being adopted by technology teams across the Firm at a very high rate. As a result the platform is still growing and evolving. As a developer on the Data team, you will work with the latest technologies such as Apache Spark, Kafka, Elastic Search, and Akka to build complex distributed applications to handle large data sets. ', 'Working knowledge of scripting languages, Linux, Networking protocols, security and file systems ', 'Experience building and sustaining long-term relationships with clients and colleagues in a diverse global organization ', '3+ years of experience with Java with a good grasp of Java development, Object Oriented Analysis and Design and testing best practices. ', 'Your clients’ background range from very technical engineers, to more functional and business facing analysts and managers. Partner with other engineering teams to understand technology offerings and how they can be applied and leveraged as part of our solutions. ', 'Experience with all stages in the development lifecycle: inception, analysis, design, review, testing, and deployment ', 'MORE ABOUT THIS JOB ', 'Judgment to prioritize and escalate issues in order to influence objectives and outcomes. ', 'Dallas, TX', 'Commercially focused; seeks to understand the requirements and how they will benefit our clients, stakeholders, and business ', '3+ years of experience with Java with a good grasp of Java development, Object Oriented Analysis and Design and testing best practices. Good understanding of distributed systems Working knowledge of scripting languages, Linux, Networking protocols, security and file systems Strong technical skills, analytical mindset, self-motivated, independent, creative, can solve interesting and sometimes difficult technical problems under time pressure and resource constraints Commercially focused; seeks to understand the requirements and how they will benefit our clients, stakeholders, and business Experience with all stages in the development lifecycle: inception, analysis, design, review, testing, and deployment Good sense of user interaction and usability design to provide an intuitive, seamless end user experience. Experience building and sustaining long-term relationships with clients and colleagues in a diverse global organization Judgment to prioritize and escalate issues in order to influence objectives and outcomes. Excellent written and verbal communication skills, including experience working directly with both technical and non-technical stakeholders', 'Good sense of user interaction and usability design to provide an intuitive, seamless end user experience. ', ' ', 'Participate in design, build out, and maintenance of a distributed, multi-region, scalable, resilient platform. ', 'Good understanding of distributed systems ', 'OUR IMPACT ', 'Strong technical skills, analytical mindset, self-motivated, independent, creative, can solve interesting and sometimes difficult technical problems under time pressure and resource constraints ', 'Make data a strategic asset for the enterprise by providing a platform that enables the structuring, management, integration, control, discovery, usage, and governance of our Data Assets. ', 'RESPONSIBILITIES AND QUALIFICATIONS ', 'All roles in Data Architecture offer the opportunity to work Directly with various senior stakeholder across Technology Division and their Business sponsors. ', 'Dallas, TX ', 'SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE ', 'You will collect requirements, and assess technical feasibility of their requests of your clients and adjacent technology platforms ', 'Big Data Developer - Data Architecture', 'Big Data Developer - Data Architecture ', 'Our team, Data Architecture, is focused on the firm’s data strategy. Data Engineers are responsible for the Firm’s strategic repository for enterprise data. Technology teams across the Firm are clients, participating in providing and consuming data. Developers on the team create and manage the software that manages the data, ensure entitlements are enforced appropriately, data is milestoned, and is available for query on multiple target warehouse platforms. This platform enables structuring, management, integration, control, discovery, usage, and governance of our Data Assets. ', '\xa0 ']

['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Large software systems design, development, testing, and maintenance.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Systems programming: systems-level programming and hacking operating systems (especially Linux).', 'Systems Software Engineer', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Programming languages: C/C++ on Linux', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BS, MS, or PhD in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a comparable technical discipline', 'As an employer, we are small, discreet, and highly selective. We look for exceptional people with proven track records of performance and achievement. We are far more interested in aptitude and potential than expertise in any particular technology, tool set, or professional domain. If working on interesting problems with talented colleagues inspires you, we invite you to share your resume and explore the possibility of joining our team.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Development and support of real-time operations and critical production systems.', 'For over three decades, the QS team has built quantitative trading systems that have produced exceptional results across a range of financial markets. We use scientific methods and engineering discipline to solve challenging problems and develop technology solutions. Our office is as unique as our location, combining elements of high tech, finance, and applied research in a collegial atmosphere and beautiful workspace.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Expertise building low-level systems or components that require a relentless focus on quality and reliability (such as kernels, operating systems, file systems, hypervisors, VMMs, large scale distributed systems, core database platforms, or similar).', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience developing multi-threaded or shared memory systems.', 'Specific skills and experience will include a combination of the following:', 'At QS, at-scale computing is core to what we do, and systems-oriented software engineers are an essential part of our team.\xa0We seek highly skilled engineers who can work effectively with others, have strong problem-solving skills, and pay attention to details. Our hierarchy is uncommonly flat, and we have few meetings, so a premium is placed on self-motivated people who can collaborate effectively and deliver great individual results.\xa0']

job_text: ['At our firm, you will work in an environment that values creativity, collaboration and compassion for one another.  We also offer the following programs and benefits to support our team: \xa0 ', 'As a key member of the engineering team working on the first autonomous robot in US farms, you will:\xa0 ', 'Shape a revolutionary product in its early days', 'Standard software development practices: coding standards, code reviews, version control, and testing ', 'Health benefits (medical, dental, and vision) ', 'Competitive salary and equity in the company 401k match program Health benefits (medical, dental, and vision) Flexible vacation & time-off policy Shape a revolutionary product in its early days', 'Role DescriptionWe are looking for a curious and passionate individual to build the new software capabilities of the machines. You will work on a distributed architecture with firm real-time constraints that enable our farming robots to reliably act on each plant with precision and speed.  ', 'Proficient in Python and C++ ', 'Experience in object-oriented programming, multithreading and system architecture in Linux environment ', 'Take part in all phases of software development: concept, design, prototyping, and production ', '\xa0Qualifications ', 'Robotics Software Engineer ', 'Nice to have:  ', 'Algorithm development ', ' ', "At our company, we are building autonomous farming robots to help agriculture become more sustainable.  With our current team of 15, we're already deployed our first wave of robots, generating revenue and completing valuable work for farmers. ", 'Background in Robotics ', 'Qualifications', 'Familiar with ROS Background in Robotics Algorithm development ', 'New York, NY ', 'Competitive salary and equity in the company ', '401k match program ', 'Role Description', 'Improve and deliver reliable software through continuous integration, automated testing and code reviews ', 'Familiar with ROS ', 'Take part in all phases of software development: concept, design, prototyping, and production Improve and deliver reliable software through continuous integration, automated testing and code reviews ', "You're a self-starter who has experience:  ", '1+ yrs. writing robust, production-ready, well-written code Proficient in Python and C++ Experience in object-oriented programming, multithreading and system architecture in Linux environment Standard software development practices: coding standards, code reviews, version control, and testing ', '1+ yrs. writing robust, production-ready, well-written code ', 'Flexible vacation & time-off policy ']

job_text: ['Ability to communicate technical concepts effectively, both written and orally, as well as the interpersonal skills required to collaborate effectively with colleagues across diverse technology teams ', 'Overview:', 'Collaborate with business software engineering teams on solving business problems via the architecture and engineering of cloud native applications ', 'Experience with infrastructure and configuration as code solutions, including Terraform, Ansible, or cloud-init ', 'Collaborate with business software engineering teams on solving business problems via the architecture and engineering of cloud native applications Engage with the larger Core Engineering organization to create and deliver usable, safe cloud native engineering patterns with associated guardrails and operational practices Partner with our information security teams on the identification, analysis, and mitigation of risks related to cloud services Create, communicate, and promote best practices for public cloud native development across the firm ', 'Overview: ', 'Responsibilities:', 'Experience architecting, designing, administering, or developing applications in Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform, or Microsoft Azure (SaaS, PaaS, IaaS) Ability to communicate technical concepts effectively, both written and orally, as well as the interpersonal skills required to collaborate effectively with colleagues across diverse technology teams Engineer secure applications and solutions in a cloud native environment Proficiency in designing, developing, and testing software in one or more of Python, Java, Groovy, or golang; open to using and learning multiple languages Ability to reason about performance, security, and process interactions in complex distributed systems Ability to understand and effectively debug both new and existing solutions ', 'Engage with the larger Core Engineering organization to create and deliver usable, safe cloud native engineering patterns with associated guardrails and operational practices ', 'Qualifications:', 'The cloud software team is responsible for enabling the use of public cloud services across the firm. As part of your role you will be partnering with core and business-aligned software engineering and SRE teams to deliver secure, resilient, and scalable cloud native solutions. Additionally, a key responsibility will be researching, architecting, and securing new cloud services, solutions, and features for general use by our Engineering organization. We are in the growth stage of adopting cloud native principles for our applications and you will be directly helping to architect and engineer the technology strategies that will give our business a competitive edge! ', 'Familiarity with cloud network architectures and the integration with hybrid cloud networking Experience with serverless platforms such as AWS Lambda and Google Cloud Functions Experience with infrastructure and configuration as code solutions, including Terraform, Ansible, or cloud-init Experience with container orchestration and service mesh architectures, including Kubernetes/Istio, Pivotal Cloud Foundry, or Consul Familiarity with Linux OS engineering, configuration management, and troubleshooting', 'Familiarity with cloud network architectures and the integration with hybrid cloud networking ', 'Create, communicate, and promote best practices for public cloud native development across the firm ', 'Experience with serverless platforms such as AWS Lambda and Google Cloud Functions ', 'Engineer secure applications and solutions in a cloud native environment ', 'Software Engineer - Cloud Services ', 'Proficiency in designing, developing, and testing software in one or more of Python, Java, Groovy, or golang; open to using and learning multiple languages ', ' ', 'Experience architecting, designing, administering, or developing applications in Amazon Web Services, Google Cloud Platform, or Microsoft Azure (SaaS, PaaS, IaaS) ', 'Preferred Qualifications ', 'New York, NY\xa0 ', 'Familiarity with Linux OS engineering, configuration management, and troubleshooting', 'Ability to understand and effectively debug both new and existing solutions ', 'Experience with container orchestration and service mesh architectures, including Kubernetes/Istio, Pivotal Cloud Foundry, or Consul ', 'Ability to reason about performance, security, and process interactions in complex distributed systems ', 'Software Engineer - Cloud Services', 'Partner with our information security teams on the identification, analysis, and mitigation of risks related to cloud services ', 'New York, NY\xa0', '\xa0 ']

job_text: [' ', 'Cloud Platform Developer', 'Cloud Platform Developer ', 'Digital Experience is part of Core Engineering at our company. It is a global, multi-disciplinary team responsible for researching, designing and building world-class tools, practices and systems used by Engineers across our company. We aim to provide efficient and effective SDLC processes, and best in class tooling for communication and collaboration across the workplace. Cloud Platforms Development is responsible for leading the firmwide strategy surrounding cloud native development and the tooling and applications that are made available by the firm’s cloud providers. As a developer on this team, you will be responsible for helping guide this new firmwide initiative. ', 'New York, NY ', '', 'SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE WE ARE LOOKING FOR', 'HOW YOU WILL FULFILL YOUR POTENTIAL• Engage with internal teams to provide timely end-to-end delivery of appropriate cloud native solutions• Provide technical guidance on established best practices to internal engineering teams and where appropriate, the business• Partner with engineering teams to understand technology offerings and how they can be applied to solve business problems• Become an expert of your domain and serve as an SME for your respective areaSKILLS AND EXPERIENCE WE ARE LOOKING FOR• Team player, eager to work in a global rapidly developing organization• Strong technical ability, willing to learn and evolve your skills with advances in cloud technology• Programming expertise in one or more of the following languages: Java, Python , Web and JavaScript• Analytical mindset, creativity and commercial focus• Judgment to prioritize and escalate issues as needed• Strong oral and written communication skillsPreferred Qualifications• Degree qualification in Computer Science or related field• Proven experience across the SDLC• Experience with Agile, Continuous Integration, Continuous Deployment• Interest and knowledge of cloud technologies and tooling', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' RESPONSIBILITIES AND QUALIFICATIONS', 'HOW YOU WILL FULFILL YOUR POTENTIAL']

job_title: Hired: Software Engineer (Security Clearance Required) - Clayton, Ca - Marks Creek

job_text: ["Our Engineers are innovators and problem-solvers, building solutions in risk management, big data, mobile and more. We look for creative collaborators who evolve, adapt to change and thrive in a fast-paced global environment.Responsibilities •  \xa0 You are energetic, self-directed and self-motivated, able to build and sustain long-term relationships with clients and colleagues•  \xa0 You approach problem solving with an open mind within the context of a team•  \xa0 You have exceptional analytical skills, able to apply knowledge and experience in decision-making to arrive at creative and commercial solutions•  \xa0 You possess a strong desire to learn and contribute solutions and ideas to a broad team•  \xa0 You are independent and comfortable in a fast paced, ambiguous and often multi-directional work environments•  \xa0 You collaborate with globally-located cross functional team in building customer-centric products•  \xa0 You analyze existing software implementations to identify areas of improvement and provide estimates for implementing new features•  \xa0 You follow standard software development guidelines and best practices•  \xa0 You create and maintain test plans, documentation and automated testing routines for all technical changes•  \xa0 You grow technical skillset by seeking out cross-training and knowledge advancement opportunitiesQualifications•  \xa0 Bachelor's degree with a concentration in Computer Science or related field•  \xa0 4+ years of experience with Java or other related Object Oriented development language•  \xa0 Experience with Javascript frameworks (Angular, Typescript, ReactJS)•  \xa0 Web development experience with HTML5, CSS3•  \xa0 Experience writing SQL queries•  \xa0 Strong written and verbal communication skills•  \xa0 Ability to establish trusted partnerships with product heads Preferred Qualifications•  \xa0 Basic knowledge of XML and JSON•  \xa0 Source Control Management systems (i.e., SVN, Git)•  \xa0 An understanding of common application architecture design patterns (i.e., MVC, MVVM)•  \xa0 Experience working in an Agile environment"]

', 'Real-time query engine – design, implement our state-of-the-art in-memory query engine to bring quick insights to customers ', 'Design, implement our proprietary cutting edge Hadoop/Spark based systems ', 'Collaboration on requirements – Work with the Engineering, Product Management, and Sales teams to come up with features that would help us and our clients be more productive and improve the bottom line ', 'A degree in Computer Science is preferred Proven hands-on experience with Hadoop, Yarn, MapReduce, Spark, Kafka, HBase Experience developing robust and scalable data pipelines and underlying technologies 5+ years of experience with Java or Scala, experience with C++ or C# is acceptable Proficiency in relational and NoSQL databases is preferred Experience with AWS and working knowledge of AWS data management, DevOps processes and technologies (Jenkins/Travis, Docker, Kubernetes, monitoring systems, etc) is a plus Understanding of analytics, statistics and data science algorithms a plus Good understanding of Object Oriented programming and design Strong knowledge of common algorithms and data structures. job_text: ['Job Description']

[' ', '', 'Exceptional Software Engineer ', 'We’re looking for a select few uniquely excellent software engineers to join our world-class team. Exceptional Software Engineers at our firm are creative, energetic, friendly, entrepreneurial, and collaborative. If you could walk around our office, you’d see that we’re a focused, intent, and nimble company with none of the attitude and bureaucracy of a stereotypical Wall Street trading firm.\xa0 ', 'Our engineers love to work on challenging and complicated problems, and in return, they have a chance to make a direct impact on our bottom line. For the right talent, there is fantastic growth potential. ', 'Exceptional Software Engineer', "Our standards for code quality are high, and our bar for the software engineers who write it is stratospheric.  The most successful engineers at our company move fluidly between roles over time. Engineering jobs at our company have some different flavors with a mix of C++, Java, and Python focuses. \xa0Having said that, we're open to any OOP experience, so long as you're comfortable working in one of our primary languages."]

['', 'Proven track record of dealing directly with clients is required', ' 5+ years’ experience in statistical and econometric analysis, with emphasis in the area of Marketing Mix Analysis ', '5+ years’ experience in statistical and econometric analysis, with emphasis in the area of Marketing Mix Analysis', 'Comprehensive understanding of metrics: Media (e.g. impression, GRP, CPV etc.), Measurement analytics, Quantitative business measures (LTV, ROI, Effectiveness, etc.), Statistics (Correlations, sample sizing, t-value VIF etc.). ', 'Essential Functions', ' Lead a team of 2 people Communication skills to convert complex analytical processes into easily digestible communications for both research and non-research audiences Proven track record of dealing directly with clients is required ', 'Experience with the following industry tools a plus: Syndicated Consumer (e.g. Simmons, MRI), Syndicated Sales (e.g. IRI, Nielsen), Media Consumption (e.g. N-Power, Arbitron, Comscore), Paid Media Monitoring (e.g. Kantar, AdViews), Social Media Monitoring (e.g. NetBase, Sysomos), 1st Party (e.g. CRM), 3rd Party (e.g. Blue Kai), Digital Ad Server (e.g. DART, Atlas, Mediamind) & Site Served, Website Analytics (e.g. Omniture, Web Trends)', ' Own analytics relationship with clients on market mix modeling, and media effectiveness measurement and digital reporting and continually engage and consult with them. Provide on-going analytical leadership in regards to media/marketing mix modeling, attribution, and media optimization for clients. Provide support in developing analytic responses to client strategic issues. Topics may include media mix modeling, cross-channel attribution, and strategic budgeting decisions, digital KPIs. Work in an integrated fashion with client marketing insight and marketing professionals to make recommendations based on analyses and experience.  Work with internal stakeholders to enhance analytic processes, and develop new capabilities to increase real-time media allocation optimization. ', 'Bachelor’s degree in Economics, Statistics or related quantitative discipline. ', 'Provide on-going analytical leadership in regards to media/marketing mix modeling, attribution, and media optimization for clients.', 'Business Responsibilities', 'Knowledge of a variety of analytic tools. Fluency in Python, R, or any other advanced analytics software package. Knowledge of Tableau & Sharepoint or any other dashboarding & data visualization tools. ', 'Provide support in developing analytic responses to client strategic issues. Topics may include media mix modeling, cross-channel attribution, and strategic budgeting decisions, digital KPIs.', 'Qualifications', 'Lead a team of 2 people', 'Strong project management skills and the ability to simultaneously lead multiple ongoing project streams.', 'About Us', 'Work in an integrated fashion with client marketing insight and marketing professionals to make recommendations based on analyses and experience. ', 'Skills', 'Position Summary', 'Education', 'People Responsibilities', ' Expertise with advanced analytic techniques, such as multivariate regression analysis, Bayesian shrinkage, predictive modeling, logistic regression, factor analysis, sales forecasting, response prediction, advertising effectiveness, market mix and ROI measurement, data visualization, simulation and optimization. Comprehensive understanding of metrics: Media (e.g. impression, GRP, CPV etc.), Measurement analytics, Quantitative business measures (LTV, ROI, Effectiveness, etc.), Statistics (Correlations, sample sizing, t-value VIF etc.).  Knowledge of a variety of analytic tools. Fluency in Python, R, or any other advanced analytics software package. Knowledge of Tableau & Sharepoint or any other dashboarding & data visualization tools.  Strong project management skills and the ability to simultaneously lead multiple ongoing project streams. Experience with the following industry tools a plus: Syndicated Consumer (e.g. Simmons, MRI), Syndicated Sales (e.g. IRI, Nielsen), Media Consumption (e.g. N-Power, Arbitron, Comscore), Paid Media Monitoring (e.g. Kantar, AdViews), Social Media Monitoring (e.g. NetBase, Sysomos), 1st Party (e.g. CRM), 3rd Party (e.g. Blue Kai), Digital Ad Server (e.g. DART, Atlas, Mediamind) & Site Served, Website Analytics (e.g. Omniture, Web Trends) ', 'Expertise with advanced analytic techniques, such as multivariate regression analysis, Bayesian shrinkage, predictive modeling, logistic regression, factor analysis, sales forecasting, response prediction, advertising effectiveness, market mix and ROI measurement, data visualization, simulation and optimization.', ' Bachelor’s degree in Economics, Statistics or related quantitative discipline.  Graduate degree is a plus ', 'Work Experience', 'Own analytics relationship with clients on market mix modeling, and media effectiveness measurement and digital reporting and continually engage and consult with them.', 'Graduate degree is a plus', 'Communication skills to convert complex analytical processes into easily digestible communications for both research and non-research audiences', 'Work with internal stakeholders to enhance analytic processes, and develop new capabilities to increase real-time media allocation optimization.']

['', 'Understanding of Java frameworks or libraries (i.e. Spring, Hibernate, Struts) ', 'Senior Java Developer', 'Become a respected subject matter expert at the client site, addressing their technical, development, and strategic IT requirements ', 'Passion for open source, software, tooling, and automation', 'Become a respected subject matter expert at the client site, addressing their technical, development, and strategic IT requirements Use your critical thinking skills to tackle tough problems in an innovative way Define overall system architectures and manage software specification, design, testing, and deployment of open source solutions Act as a trusted advisor at the client site and assist the project or technical managers in setting and delivering on expectations Maintain an in-depth understanding of industry practices and thorough project experience and training Respond to incidents, escalations, and exceptions in a professional manner ', 'Comfortable working with highly distributed teams, including interaction with the open source communities over email and IRC ', 'Experience working in a quality assurance role or working with ticketing systems or bug tracking tools is preferred ', "We are looking for a qualified Java Developer to passionately promote the adoption of a major tech company's solutions in key enterprise accounts, government agencies, and service provider partners. Through a series of interactions both in-person and remotely, you will win the trust and confidence of customers' engineering, development, and operations teams by aligning their requirements and use cases with the functional capabilities of the solution. As a Cloud Developer, you'll play a critical role in bringing together cross-functional teams from Product Engineering, Support, Professional Services, and Sales to meet the needs of our most demanding customers. You will also act as the customer's advocate with these organizations to deliver the right solutions and ensure they are implemented and supported in an innovative and reliable way. We'll need you to have a thorough working knowledge and hands-on experience with JEE, middleware application architectures (i.e. enterprise integration, business automation, big data, mobility), and their supporting infrastructures. You will also need a good understanding of how to leverage unique middleware applications (i.e. JBoss Middleware, JBoss Fuse, and OpenShift) for implementing custom solutions, as well as capabilities in DevOps, continuous integration, and cloud-based development consulting projects. job_title: Engineer II/Sr. Engineer, Cell Therapy Process Development
job_text: ['', 'MS in Chemical/Biochemical Engineering or related discipline and 2 to 5 years of relevant experience; or BS in Chemical/Biochemical Engineering or related discipline and 5+ years of relevant experience;Experience with operation of mammalian cell culture systems, including flasks, waves, stirred tanks and bioreactors;Experience with Design of Experiments (DOE) for process development and process optimization;Excellent oral and written communication skills;Ability to work independently as well as part of a results-oriented team;Highly organized with significant attention to detail; and,The ideal candidate enjoys working in a fast-paced environment and breaking new ground in the gene and cell therapy space.', 'Perform and analyze in vitro cellular assays such as cell counts and flow cytometry to support in-process analysis for process development studies;', 'Experience with Design of Experiments (DOE) for process development and process optimization;', 'Preferred Qualifications of the Engineer II/Sr. Engineer, Cell Therapy Process Development (Scale Up, Upstream)', 'Support the development of processes in a variety of bench top and multiplex bioreactors suitable for CAR-T and/or hematopoietic stem cell expansion;', 'Experience with tech transfer of processes for GMP manufacturing.', 'Excellent oral and written communication skills;', 'Minimum Qualifications of the Engineer II/Sr. Engineer, Cell Therapy Process Development (Scale-up, Upstream)', 'Job Summary', 'Experience with operation of mammalian cell culture systems, including flasks, waves, stirred tanks and bioreactors;', 'Experience developing processes for early phase clinical products;', 'Ability to work independently as well as part of a results-oriented team;', 'Experience developing processes for early phase clinical products;Experience with multi-color flow cytometry;Knowledge of Immunology or immune-oncology, especially T cell biology;Experience with gene editing and cell selection technologies for primary human cells.Working knowledge of GXPs and generation/review of GMP documents; and,Experience with tech transfer of processes for GMP manufacturing.', 'Knowledge of Immunology or immune-oncology, especially T cell biology;', 'MS in Chemical/Biochemical Engineering or related discipline and 2 to 5 years of relevant experience; or BS in Chemical/Biochemical Engineering or related discipline and 5+ years of relevant experience;', 'Optimize manufacturing processes including cell selection, cell culture, gene editing and gene transfer with electroporation and viral vectors;', 'Responsibilities of the Engineer II/Sr. Engineer, Cell Therapy Process Development ', 'Highly organized with significant attention to detail; and,', 'Support drafting and revising protocols and SOPs and regulatory sections and filings (i.e. IND)', 'Experience with multi-color flow cytometry;', 'Company Overview', 'Collect, analyze and present experimental data;', 'Maintain clear and complete experiment records;', 'Working knowledge of GXPs and generation/review of GMP documents; and,', 'Engineer II/Sr. Engineer, Cell Therapy Process Development ', 'Document development activities in Technical Reports supporting regulatory filings; and,', 'Independently execute experiments to establish cellular process parameters and process scale-up activities.Support the development of processes in a variety of bench top and multiplex bioreactors suitable for CAR-T and/or hematopoietic stem cell expansion;Optimize manufacturing processes including cell selection, cell culture, gene editing and gene transfer with electroporation and viral vectors;Perform and analyze in vitro cellular assays such as cell counts and flow cytometry to support in-process analysis for process development studies;Collect, analyze and present experimental data;Maintain clear and complete experiment records;Document development activities in Technical Reports supporting regulatory filings; and,Support drafting and revising protocols and SOPs and regulatory sections and filings (i.e. IND)', 'Experience with gene editing and cell selection technologies for primary human cells.', 'Independently execute experiments to establish cellular process parameters and process scale-up activities.', 'The ideal candidate enjoys working in a fast-paced environment and breaking new ground in the gene and cell therapy space.']

job_title: Senior Staff Engineer, and Test Engineer Manager

identifies problems and solutions that others might miss; provides detailed insight and constructive criticism into problems and complex situations ', ' Demonstrated record of releasing high volume products into production environment, including wafer sort and package / module test ', '   Displaying Technical Expertise:  Keeps his/her technical skills current; effectively applies specialized knowledge and skills to perform work tasks; understands and masters the technical skills, knowledge, and tasks associated with his/her job; shares technical expertise with others    Driving for Results:  Aggressively pursues challenging goals and objectives; will to put in considerable time and effort to accomplish objectives; takes a highly focused, goal driven approach toward work    Critical Thinking:  Skilled at finding logical flaws in arguments and plans; identifies problems and solutions that others might miss; provides detailed insight and constructive criticism into problems and complex situations    Delivering High Quality Work:  Critically reviews work processes to ensure quality; addresses problems that could impact quality; makes sure project deliverables and services meet all requirements and expectations; does not make the same mistakes twice    Working with Ambiguity  : Achieves forward progress in the face of poorly defined situations and/or unclear goals; able to work effectively with limited or partial information  ', ' Delivering High Quality Work: ', ' Participating as a hands-on contributor for projects that are assigned to the team ', ' 2 years of experience leading or managing individuals and/or teams ', ' Demonstrated ability to release new solutions off-shore ', ' Experience working with OSAT’s on turnkey test developments ', ' Reviewing results and reports provided by team, provide constructive feedback ', ' This position has responsibility for: ', ' Measurement system analysis (GRR) ', ' Representing team with presentations in manager level project reviews ', ' Owning TE responsibilities for products assigned to the group ', 'This Position Has Management Responsibility For', ' Helping recruit, select, and train new employees ', ' Responsible for following processes & procedures relating to new product development ', ' In-depth knowledge of RF, Analog or Mixed-signal Integrated Circuits ', '  12 years of relevant experience in test development or 8 years with Master’s degree   2 years of experience with direct management of ATE test development projects and resources   Demonstrated record of releasing high volume products into production environment, including wafer sort and package / module test   In-depth knowledge of RF, Analog or Mixed-signal Integrated Circuits   Demonstrated understanding of test methodologies for Analog, Digital and RF circuits   Experience with Rack and stack ATE systems including VXI / PXI and/or commercial ATE platforms; LTX (Cohu), Teradyne, Advantest   Demonstrated ability to release new solutions off-shore   Excellent software skills with demonstrated proficiency using a high level programming language such as C/C++, VB/VBA, Python, etc.   Proven experience in developing ATE test solutions for high volume production of RF, Analog or Mixed-signal Integrated Circuits   Exceptional organization and attentiveness to detail   Must be a team player   Must be punctual  ', 'Job Summary', ' Practicing hands-on training with team to solve difficult problems ', 'Preferred Qualifications', ' Leading efforts for continuous improvement of processes followed by the test engineering team ', ' 12 years of relevant experience in test development or 8 years with Master’s degree ', ' Experience with Rack and stack ATE systems including VXI / PXI and/or commercial ATE platforms; effectively applies specialized knowledge and skills to perform work tasks; understands and masters the technical skills, knowledge, and tasks associated with his/her job; shares technical expertise with others ', ' Assigning and prioritizing tasks for team members such that overall project plans can be supported ', ' Must be punctual ', ' Critical Thinking: ', '  Leading efforts for continuous improvement of processes followed by the test engineering team   Owning TE responsibilities for products assigned to the group   Reviewing results and reports provided by team, provide constructive feedback   Responsible for following processes & procedures relating to new product development   Participating as a hands-on contributor for projects that are assigned to the team   Designing and developing necessary hardware and software to create a complete test solution   Transferring production test solution to off-shore test facility when necessary   Working closely with OSAT’s on turnkey test developments, performing test feasibility studies, test planning and providing technical oversight   Understanding schematic design while working with vendors through the layout and fabrication process for load boards and probe cards   Measurement system analysis (GRR)  ', '  Driving for Results:  Aggressively pursues challenging goals and objectives; will to put in considerable time and effort to accomplish objectives; takes a highly focused, goal driven approach toward work ', ' Working closely with OSAT’s on turnkey test developments, performing test feasibility studies, test planning and providing technical oversight ', ' Exceptional organization and attentiveness to detail ', ' BS in Electrical Engineering or MS in Electrical Engineering with relevant experience ', '  Optimizing team performance by motivating team by example, influence, training and structure   Managing the career development of team members through goal setting and providing feedback   Helping recruit, select, and train new employees   Assigning and prioritizing tasks for team members such that overall project plans can be supported   Incorporating corporate strategies and technical data when making decisions that impact new products or projects   Representing team with presentations in manager level project reviews   Practicing hands-on training with team to solve difficult problems  ', ' Designing and developing necessary hardware and software to create a complete test solution ', ' Excellent software skills with demonstrated proficiency using a high level programming language such as C/C++, VB/VBA, Python, etc. ', ' Optimizing team performance by motivating team by example, influence, training and structure ', ' Working with Ambiguity ', '  Working with Ambiguity  : Achieves forward progress in the face of poorly defined situations and/or unclear goals;
