job_title: Mentor - Data Engineering Course (Part-Time/Remote) - San Francisco
job_text: ['', ' Completely online and self-paced', ' Professional experience with SQL and an OOP language like Python or Java', ' Have an excellent understanding of fundamental data engineering skills, tools, and concepts including working with Big Data (Hadoop, Spark), Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure), building data pipelines (batch/streaming, APIs), orchestration (Airflow), and containerization (Kubernetes, Docker).', ' Receive a monthly per-student honorarium', ' Work at your convenience', ' Are as passionate about teaching Data Engineering as about Data Engineering itself', ' Membership in a rich community of expert mentors from great companies like Apple, Uber, and Pandora', ' Are able to provide some limited support outside of calls to answer questions and review projects ', ' Students learn about Data Engineering with the help of a curated online curriculum, project-based deliverables and a personal mentor', ' Designed to be completed in 6 months', ' Coursework is made up of 450+ hours curated curriculum in collaboration with leading Data Engineering subject matter experts (SMEs)', ' Change the lives of students in our program', ' Help us revolutionize online education and inspire career changers into Data Engineering!', ' Are empathetic and have excellent communication skills, able to break down complex concepts for beginners, and provide meaningful career guidance', 'The Opportunity', ' Have at least 3 years of experience solving real-life data engineering problems, and are comfortable working with large data sets', ' Completely online and self-paced  Designed to be completed in 6 months  Coursework is made up of 450+ hours curated curriculum in collaboration with leading Data Engineering subject matter experts (SMEs)  Participants in this course are working professionals and college students from all over the world looking to become Data Engineers or apply Data Engineering to advance their careers  Students learn about Data Engineering with the help of a curated online curriculum, project-based deliverables and a personal mentor  Students have a weekly 30-minute video call with their mentor to discuss questions, projects, and career advice!', ' You', ' Are available for weekly, 30-minute video check-ins with students to help them set and achieve learning goals, answer subject matter questions, provide feedback on projects, and career advice', 'Benefits', ' Have at least 3 years of experience as a Data Engineer or Data Developer or related fields (Machine Learning, Data Scientist, etc)', ' Students have a weekly 30-minute video call with their mentor to discuss questions, projects, and career advice!', ' Participants in this course are working professionals and college students from all over the world looking to become Data Engineers or apply Data Engineering to advance their careers', ' Membership in a rich community of expert mentors from great companies like Apple, Uber, and Pandora  Change the lives of students in our program  Help us revolutionize online education and inspire career changers into Data Engineering!  Receive a monthly per-student honorarium  Work at your convenience We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.The Springboard team of 180 works out of offices in the heart of San Francisco and Bengaluru. We’re backed by top investors, including Costanoa Ventures, Reach Capital, Learn Capital, Pearson Ventures, and the founders of LinkedIn and Princeton Review.Working with us, you’ll enjoy competitive compensation, health insurance coverage (for employees based in California, our base plans are fully covered by Springboard; for employees based outside of California, we offer low-premium coverage), a 401k plan, a generous learning budget, team lunches and snacks, and an opportunity to impact thousands of lives alongside a fun, dedicated and mission-driven team. To learn more about our team and culture, follow us on Instagram !We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We welcome applications from all backgrounds, and do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.', ' Are as passionate about teaching Data Engineering as about Data Engineering itself  Have at least 3 years of experience as a Data Engineer or Data Developer or related fields (Machine Learning, Data Scientist, etc)  Professional experience with SQL and an OOP language like Python or Java  Have an excellent understanding of fundamental data engineering skills, tools, and concepts including working with Big Data (Hadoop, Spark), Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure), building data pipelines (batch/streaming, APIs), orchestration (Airflow), and containerization (Kubernetes, Docker).  Have at least 3 years of experience solving real-life data engineering problems, and are comfortable working with large data sets  Are available for weekly, 30-minute video check-ins with students to help them set and achieve learning goals, answer subject matter questions, provide feedback on projects, and career advice  Are able to provide some limited support outside of calls to answer questions and review projects   Are empathetic and have excellent communication skills, able to break down complex concepts for beginners, and provide meaningful career guidance', ' The Program']

['', 'Conducting project related research (historical data, regulations, etc.)', 'Operation and maintenance of surface remediation systems', ' This position requires both field and office work, field work may be performed at project sites with environmental media (e.g., soil, sediment, groundwater, surface water, etc.) impacted with hazardous substances and/or hazardous wastes. Candidates must also be able to meet the physical demands associated with performing field work, including lifting up to 75 pounds, working in a standing position for extended periods of time, working outdoors in inclement weather. Candidates must demonstrate strong communication skills, the ability to work well in a team environment, a strong background in MS Office, and desire to pursue a career in the environmental sector. The ideal candidate will have efficient time management and the flexibility required to support different project managers concurrently. ', 'Oversight of drilling operations (installing soil borings requiring soil and rock descriptions, and monitoring wells installation)', 'Subcontractor oversight', ' Soil, groundwater, and air sampling in compliance with State/Federal standards Operation and maintenance of surface remediation systems Oversight of drilling operations (installing soil borings requiring soil and rock descriptions, and monitoring wells installation) Subcontractor oversight ', 'Figure/map/boring log production', 'Field Activities May Include The Following', 'Licensed geologist or on track to obtain a license.', '  Data management (compilation, manipulation, and evaluation of data) Assisting with writing and preparing technical reports, work plans, letters, and memoranda Coordinating work schedules with subcontractors Conducting project related research (historical data, regulations, etc.) Preparing periodic status/program reports Figure/map/boring log production ', 'The ideal candidate will have efficient time management and the flexibility required to support different project managers concurrently.', 'Candidates must also be able to meet the physical demands associated with performing field work, including lifting up to 75 pounds, working in a standing position for extended periods of time, working outdoors in inclement weather.', 'Candidates must demonstrate strong communication skills, the ability to work well in a team environment, a strong background in MS Office, and desire to pursue a career in the environmental sector.', " Bachelor's Degree in Geology, Chemistry, or other related science field from an accredited college/university preferred, additional experience may be used in lieu of a degree (Other education, commensurate experience and demonstrated ability of individual may be substituted.) Licensed geologist or on track to obtain a license. Must have a minimum of 2+ years of directly related experience. understands market issues & trends influencing utilization of optical technologies in new product develop or the enhancement of existing productsCommunicates effectively with internal & external customers.', 'At least 3 years’ successful sales experience of optical technologies to Medical OEMs ', 'A competitive salary is offered – depending upon experience\xa0\xa0', 'Experience managing key accounts in an OEM or contract manufacturing environment, including negotiating pricing or contracts', 'Competitive with a passion for winning', 'Develops and maintains effective relationships with multiple customer departments (purchasing, research & development, engineering, piloting/process & production.)', 'Communicates effectively with internal & external customers.', 'Functions as a subject matter expert; understands market issues & trends influencing utilization of optical technologies in new product develop or the enhancement of existing products', 'Are you complimented on your ability to accurately assess customer opportunities and make good decisions with the data-at-hand?\xa0Are you able to work quickly with a high degree of autonomy?\xa0', 'Develops strategies and implements plans to grow profitable sales.', 'The Senior Sales Engineer reports to the Director of Sales and Marketing.', 'Masters or advanced degree in Engineering or Business a plus', 'Compensation', 'Excellent interpersonal and team-building skills.Competitive with a passion for winningAbsolute personal integrity and credibilityAbility to lead / manage multiple projects concurrently', 'Location', 'Are you looking for a situation that will support your professional growth and development, provide high visibility and reward accomplishments?\xa0Then you might find a career here.\xa0', 'Absolute personal integrity and credibility', 'required', 'Are you complimented for your exceptional project management skills; both by customers and your company?\xa0Are you effective selling your recommendations to customers and gathering support within your organization? Are you effective communicating the voice of the customer to the various functional areas of your organization?\xa0Do you recognize that while it is always necessary to be a team player; sometimes it is necessary to lead and other times to follow?\xa0Do you know when to change hats regarding leadership and team player?\xa0', 'Education and experience ', 'Personality', 'Within a 90 minutes radius of Boston Logan Airport.\xa0\xa0', 'A competitive salary is offered – depending upon experience\xa0\xa0An uncapped incentive compensation plan that is based on results achieved Comprehensive benefits package that includes that include medical, dental, vision, life insurance, short and long-term disability, paid holidays, vacation, personal and sick time, flexible spending accounts and 401(k) profit sharing/savings plan. job_text: ['', 'Experience with networking components (routers, switches, load balancers, etc.)', 'Provide support for completing security control audits.', 'Experience with event and log correlation', 'Provide second and third tier support for troubleshooting production issues. Perform root cause analysis and implement sustainable fixes.', 'Partner with internal stakeholders to implement security policies in cloud-native tools.', ' Advanced experience with administering CASB solutions Comprehensive understanding of security methodologies and best practices Experience with networking components (routers, switches, load balancers, etc.) Knowledge of firewalls, proxies, and web servers Experience in automation and scripting of applications and systems Experience in anomaly detection (signature / behavioral) Experience with event and log correlation ', 'Design, develop and recommend solutions that ensure the security of data in cloud services.', 'Responsible for administering and supporting security configuration of the enterprise CASB solution.', 'Partner with Security Architecture in the design process to formulate security design patterns.', ' Design, develop and recommend solutions that ensure the security of data in cloud services. Support integration of cloud-native tools with existing on-premises solutions to enhance visibility of user activity across cloud services. Partner with Security Architecture in the design process to formulate security design patterns. Responsible for administering and supporting security configuration of the enterprise CASB solution. Build, integrate and tune cloud-specific solutions in alignment with enterprise strategy and vision. Partner with internal stakeholders to implement security policies in cloud-native tools. ['', 'Work with CM’s to develop test methods, test protocols, test equipment, firmware and test fixtures to fully test PCBA and Electrical sub-systems during manufacturing.', 'Perform Verification and Validation testing as required to release new designs to production.', 'Design for compliance with U.S., Canadian, European, and other International Regulatory Standards including Electrical Safety and EMC/EMI for medical devices. i.e.: IEC 60601, FCC and ISO standards as required.\xa0', 'Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a fast-paced environment is crucial.', 'Work with cross-functional teams including marketing, service, software, system engineering and others to develop system architecture, specifications and requirements for complex medical systems.', 'Bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering and 5+ years of experience as an electrical/electronic engineer', 'Design and develop efficient electrical cabling system and wire harnesses for medical devices.', 'We are data driven and milestone oriented. We are looking for self-starters, and good team players. Join us in our journey in improving healthcare.', 'Must be well organized and enjoy working in a fast-paced dynamic environment.', 'Work with cross-functional teams including marketing, service, software, system engineering and others to develop system architecture, specifications and requirements for complex medical systems.Work with cross-functional team of engineering, service, manufacturing and others to integrate custom and OEM electronic components into full systems including mechanical and electrical subsystems.Design and develop efficient electrical cabling system and wire harnesses for medical devices.Develop, test and document analog and digital circuit designs.Work with product development team to develop and transfer new products into production for commercial sale.Complete designs using your full understanding of Design for Manufacture and Assembly (DFx) principles and practices for system design, cable harness design, cable harness routing, printed circuit board design including PCBA layout, design assembly and testing.Complete design and layout of printed circuit boards. Create and manage Printed Circuit Board Design files for fabrication, assembly and test.\xa0Create and manage PCBA Bills of Material.Work with CM’s to implement board and system designs into hardware.Work with CM’s to develop test methods, test protocols, test equipment, firmware and test fixtures to fully test PCBA and Electrical sub-systems during manufacturing.Work with cross functional teams to develop risks and hazards analysis including development of FMEA documents to identify risks, hazards, failure modes and mitigation strategies.Formally release documentation in support of manufacturing satisfying quality and regulatory requirements or medical devices.Perform Verification and Validation testing as required to release new designs to production.Work with NRTL to complete Electrical Safety Testing, EMC/EMI Qualification Testing and other testing as required to demonstrate compliance with IEC 60601 standards to gain compliance approval and certification for medical products.Design for compliance with U.S., Canadian, European, and other International Regulatory Standards including Electrical Safety and EMC/EMI for medical devices. i.e.: IEC 60601, FCC and ISO standards as required.\xa0', 'Track record of designs that have been successfully launched into the medical device marketplace.', 'Avail Medsystems is a pioneering medical technology company that is reinventing how medical procedures are supported by industry and clinicians. We are committed to delivering HIPAA compliant real-time video conferencing solutions that improve the quality and lower the cost of procedural care delivery.', 'Strong written, oral communication and interpersonal skills.', 'We are looking for a passionate Senior Electrical Engineer to help us realize the mission of improving medical outcomes all while reducing cost for hospitals; these are critical problems to solve as we move forward in the transformation of health care.', 'Complete designs using your full understanding of Design for Manufacture and Assembly (DFx) principles and practices for system design, cable harness design, cable harness routing, printed circuit board design including PCBA layout, design assembly and testing.', 'Work with NRTL to complete Electrical Safety Testing, EMC/EMI Qualification Testing and other testing as required to demonstrate compliance with IEC 60601 standards to gain compliance approval and certification for medical products.', 'Demonstrated experience in the test and integration of successfully shipped medical products.', 'Formally release documentation in support of manufacturing satisfying quality and regulatory requirements or medical devices.', 'Easily conforms to shifting priorities, demands and timelines through analytical and problem-solving capabilities.', 'Highly developed problem solving, communication and teamwork skills.', 'Complete design and layout of printed circuit boards. Create and manage Printed Circuit Board Design files for fabrication, assembly and test.\xa0Create and manage PCBA Bills of Material.', 'Bachelor’s degree in electrical engineering and 5+ years of experience as an electrical/electronic engineerDemonstrated experience in the test and integration of successfully shipped medical products.Experience working independently and, in a team-oriented, collaborative environment is essential.Highly developed problem solving, communication and teamwork skills.Track record of designs that have been successfully launched into the medical device marketplace.Must be well organized and enjoy working in a fast-paced dynamic environment.Easily conforms to shifting priorities, demands and timelines through analytical and problem-solving capabilities.Strong written, oral communication and interpersonal skills.Ability to effectively prioritize and execute tasks in a fast-paced environment is crucial.', 'The role of the Senior Electrical Engineer is to design and develop electrical systems for complex medical equipment. Requires strong skills and experience in analog and digital electronics design, analysis and testing.\xa0Active participation in component selection & specifications.\xa0Must be able to work with limited guidance/supervision and be able to test, evaluate, document, qualify and release designs for complex medical equipment. Candidate must be familiar with electrical and electronic best practices and have ability to quickly solve challenging problems.\xa0\xa0', 'Experience working independently and, in a team-oriented, collaborative environment is essential.', 'Work with CM’s to implement board and system designs into hardware.', 'Position Overview:', 'Work with cross functional teams to develop risks and hazards analysis including development of FMEA documents to identify risks, hazards, failure modes and mitigation strategies.', 'Develop, test and document analog and digital circuit designs.', 'Work with cross-functional team of engineering, service, manufacturing and others to integrate custom and OEM electronic components into full systems including mechanical and electrical subsystems.', 'Requirements / Skills:', 'Work with product development team to develop and transfer new products into production for commercial sale.', 'Job Responsibilities:']

job_text: ['', ' Ability to effectively operate in a team driven environment and share knowledge to achieve assigned goals and objectives.', ' Must be flexible in working hours as this position will require customer support during non-regular business hours, mandatory overtime on short notice, and/or weekend work as necessary.', ' Regularly speaks, hears, and views computers.', 'It is the policy of Philips to provide equal employment and advancement opportunities to all colleagues and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, ethnicity, religion, gender, pregnancy/childbirth, age, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability or perceived disability, genetic information, citizenship, veteran or military status or a person’s relationship or association with a protected veteran, including spouses and other family members, marital or domestic partner status, or any other category protected by federal, state and/or local laws.', 'Patient Monitoring Field Service Engineer', 'CCNA certification and network troubleshooting skills, required', 'Patient Monitoring', ' Job operates in the hospital/medical environment and remotely from home office location.', 'Our Offer', ' Microsoft and other certifications are desirable (i.e. MCTS, MCITP, VM WARE)', ' Previous experience working in a hospital environment required.', 'Physical Demands and Work Environment', ' Average driving is 1-4 hours daily and may exceed 50% at times. internal external.', 'Equal Employment and Opportunity Employer/Disabled/Veteran', ' BS Computer Science/Biomed disciplines with at least 3-5 years’ experience or AS Computer Science/Biomed disciplines with 5+ years’ experience in Healthcare / IT Technologies.', 'To succeed in this role, you should have the following skills and experience', ' Strong organizational skills, self-disciplined, and the ability to work independently.', ' Ability to participate in an on-call rotation to provide customer support.', ' Cleveland, OH area', ' Work within a dynamic customer care stoop, kneel, and extended reach.', 'In this role, you have the opportunity to', ' Frequently lift, carry, push, or pull up to 30 pounds. Occasionally lift or carry up to 50 pounds, with assistance available.', ' Install, service, and test complex IT networks following stringent real time patient data requirements.', ' Ability to adapt to changing work requirements in a complex, fast pace environment.', ' Grow the MATC business in the assigned geography within the scope of both equipment and service revenue and contract revenue.', ' Use of personal protective equipment may be required including, but not limited to, safety glasses, hard hat, hard toed shoes, and medical rubber gloves.', ' Install complex, multi-phase systems composed of IT infrastructure and patient monitoring equipment in both clinical and non-clinical environments across the geography.', 'This position will require you to meet all customer specific mandates such as vaccinations and or screening tests.', ' Ability to communicate effectively with various levels of employees and customers both verbally and in writing.', ' Troubleshoot complex network issues to ensure acceptable Quality of Service.', ' CCNA certification and network troubleshooting skills, required', ' This job includes up to 75% travel throughout the territory', 'In return, we offer you']

', 'Scope and implement AppDynamics projects, from start-to-finish, including but not limited to: Gathering requirements Data ingestion (forwarders, API calls, DB queries, modular inputs) Mapping data fields to CIM Dashboard Creation and iteration', ' AI-driven Global Supply Chain Solutions Software Product Company ', ' Best Places To Work ', 'Experience with leading a global team', ' Leading  AI-driven Global Supply Chain Solutions Software Product Company  and one of Glassdoor’s “ Best Places To Work ” ', 'Our Values']

job_title: Patient Monitoring Field Service Engineer (Home-Based: St. Louis, MO)
job_text: ['', ' Ability to effectively operate in a team driven environment and share knowledge to achieve assigned goals and objectives.', '(covering Missouri and Southern IL)', ' Must be flexible in working hours as this position will require customer support during non-regular business hours, mandatory overtime on short notice, and/or weekend work as necessary.', ' Regularly speaks, hears, and views computers.', 'It is the policy of Philips to provide equal employment and advancement opportunities to all colleagues and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, ethnicity, religion, gender, pregnancy/childbirth, age, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, disability or perceived disability, genetic information, citizenship, veteran or military status or a person’s relationship or association with a protected veteran, including spouses and other family members, marital or domestic partner status, or any other category protected by federal, state and/or local laws.', 'Patient Monitoring Field Service Engineer', 'CCNA certification and network troubleshooting skills, required', 'Patient Monitoring', ' Job operates in the hospital/medical environment and remotely from home office location.', 'Our Offer', ' Field Service Engineer', ' Microsoft and other certifications are desirable (i.e. MCTS, MCITP, VM WARE)', ' Previous experience working in a hospital environment required.', 'Physical Demands and Work Environment', ' Average driving is 1-4 hours daily and may exceed 50% at times. Occasional overnight stays and travel by air or train may be required.', 'Why should you join Philips?', ' Provide technical review of system configurations to ensure viability of system performance.', "As an equal opportunity employer, Philips is committed to a diverse workforce. In order to ensure reasonable accommodation for individuals protected by Section 503 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, the Vietnam Veterans' Readjustment Act of 1974, and Title I of the Americans with Disabilities Act of 1990, applicants that require accommodation in the job application process may contact 888-367-7223, option 5, for assistance.", ' This role routinely uses standard office equipment such as computers, phones, medical test equipment.', '#', ' Occasionally twist, and crawl.', ' Regular grasping and repetitive hand movements.', 'You are a part of a team', ' Responsible for carrying and monitoring company cell phone and being available and responsive during scheduled and non-scheduled hours, except during rest and meal periods as required by applicable state law.', ' Potential exposure to hazardous physical, chemical, and biological agents.', ' Deliver required results with high levels of customer satisfaction, both internal external.', 'Equal Employment and Opportunity Employer/Disabled/Veteran', ' BS Computer Science/Biomed disciplines with at least 3-5 years’ experience or AS Computer Science/Biomed disciplines with 5+ years’ experience in Healthcare / IT Technologies.', 'To succeed in this role, you should have the following skills and experience', ' Strong organizational skills, self-disciplined, and the ability to work independently.', ' Ability to participate in an on-call rotation to provide customer support.', ' Work within a dynamic customer care team with clinical, sales, and service partners to support the business activities at the highest level.', ' Knowledge of Patient Monitoring systems preferred', 'St Louis Area', ' Influence internal and external resources to a stated objective without formal authority.', 'You are responsible for (but not limited to)', ' Frequently in contact with electrical equipment and wireless networks.', ' Lead and direct a diverse team of internal and external resources.', ' Own the customer experience through the life cycle of customer systems from installation through end-of-support.', ' Frequently stand, walk, stoop, kneel, and extended reach.', 'In this role, you have the opportunity to', ' Frequently lift, carry, push, or pull up to 30 pounds. Occasionally lift or carry up to 50 pounds, with assistance available.', ' Install, service, and test complex IT networks following stringent real time patient data requirements.', ' Ability to adapt to changing work requirements in a complex, fast pace environment.', ' Grow the MATC business in the assigned geography within the scope of both equipment and service revenue and contract revenue.', ' Use of personal protective equipment may be required including, but not limited to, safety glasses, hard hat, hard toed shoes, and medical rubber gloves.', ' Install complex, multi-phase systems composed of IT infrastructure and patient monitoring equipment in both clinical and non-clinical environments across the geography.', 'This position will require you to meet all customer specific mandates such as vaccinations and or screening tests.', ' Ability to communicate effectively with various levels of employees and customers both verbally and in writing.', ' Troubleshoot complex network issues to ensure acceptable Quality of Service.', ' CCNA certification and network troubleshooting skills, required', ' This job includes up to 75% travel throughout the territory', 'In return, we offer you']

[' ', 'REQUIREMENTS', 'Underpinning our company is a fraud and credit risk decisioning process that instantaneouslyapproves or rejects users when they are checking out from our merchant partners. In this role,you’ll be focused on developing and maintaining the machine learning system supporting ourreal-time decisioning process. ', 'BENEFITS', 'BENEFITSCompetitive SalaryEmployee Options Scheme, which means all employees have a meaningful stake in thebusinessGenerous leave entitlementsGenerous staff referral program', 'Senior Python Engineer (Machine Learning focused)', 'REQUIREMENTS5+ years experience of software engineering experience focused on data engineering,backend engineering, or roles working on software that primarily focuses on any kind of dataheavy pipeline / toolchain (build toolchain, content pipeline, streaming, etc.).Demonstrated experience with the complete software development lifecycle is required.The ability to learn quickly in a self-directed manner.A willingness to work in Python. ', 'We are looking for a software engineer with data/backend experience to to contribute to ourefforts focused on data cleaning, data understanding, developing features for machinelearning models, benchmarking model performance, automating the configuration andoptimization of machine learning models, and putting machine learning models intoproduction. You will have the opportunity to work with state of the art technologies on largedata sets. You’ll have exposure to all aspects of of our machine learning infrastructure and thechance to define and engineer solutions that will underpin millions of transactions per year.The technologies currently being used in the machine learning infrastructure are Python,Pandas, numpy, TPOT, scikit-learn, XGBoost, Azure SQL DB, Azure Blob Storage. Thetechnologies that we are considering using include Azure Cosmos DB, Spark, Databricks,auto-sklearn, and PyTorch. ', "Our product is like lay-away for the online generation. We're one of the fastest-growingpayments startups and are looking for a Senior Engineer to join our machine learninginfrastructure team. ", 'Our firm\xa0 is an alternative payment provider that allows merchants to give their customers theopportunity to split their purchases into 4 interest-free, automatic installments. The customergets the product immediately and we pay the merchant upfront. ', 'Senior Python Engineer (Machine Learning focused) ', '(*OPEN TO REMOTE EMPLOYEES*) ']

job_title: Sales Engineer, Application Modernization, Google Cloud
job_text: ['Remote locations may be available in the following states: Texas, Alabama, Florida, Mississippi, North Carolina, Pennsylvania, and Tennessee.', '', ' Work to identify and qualify business opportunities, understand key customer technical objections and develop a strategy to resolve technical blockers. Provide in-depth enterprise infrastructure/cloud modernization expertise to support the technical relationship with Google’s customers, including product and solution briefings, proof-of-concept work, and partner directly with product management to prioritize solutions impacting customer adoption to Google Cloud.  Guide customers through assessments of their existing legacy application environments, provide recommendations on a prioritization roadmap for application modernization, and identify applications for migration to hybrid-cloud computing models. Structure and execute prototyping workshops to prove out proposed new architectures, develop best practices, and document key blocking requirements for prioritization with engineering. Travel to customer sites, conferences, and other related events as needed. ', 'Experience as a technology consultant, technical architect, technical sales engineer, or solutions architect.', 'About The Job', 'Responsibilities', 'Travel to customer sites, conferences, and other related events as needed.', 'Knowledge of application security patterns including web application security, service mesh and mobile security strategies.', 'Structure and execute prototyping workshops to prove out proposed new architectures, develop best practices, and document key blocking requirements for prioritization with engineering.', 'Experience with legacy and modern application development, cloud service delivery and deployment.', 'Experience with containers (e.g., Kubernetes, Docker) and associated technologies (e.g., Istio, Envoy).', 'Work to identify and qualify business opportunities, understand key customer technical objections and develop a strategy to resolve technical blockers.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience. ", 'Guide customers through assessments of their existing legacy application environments, provide recommendations on a prioritization roadmap for application modernization, and identify applications for migration to hybrid-cloud computing models.', "Master's degree in Computer Science or other technical field.", 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Atlanta, GA, USA; Cambridge, MA, USA; Chicago, IL, USA; Addison, TX, USA; New York, NY, USA; Los Angeles, CA, USA; Seattle, WA, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA; Sunnyvale, CA, USA; Minneapolis, MN, USA', 'Provide in-depth enterprise infrastructure/cloud modernization expertise to support the technical relationship with Google’s customers, including product and solution briefings, proof-of-concept work, and partner directly with product management to prioritize solutions impacting customer adoption to Google Cloud. ', " Master's degree in Computer Science or other technical field. Experience as a technology consultant, technical architect, technical sales engineer, or solutions architect. Experience with cloud-native software development methodologies and tools to support application development/deployment stages including CI/CD. Experience in networking areas: Linux, software-defined networking, network virtualization, open protocols, application acceleration and load balancing, DNS, VPN and their application to PaaS and IaaS technologies. Experience with large-scale deployments, developing scalable architectures using API management, microservice frameworks, PaaS and container orchestration systems. Knowledge of application security patterns including web application security, service mesh and mobile security strategies. ", 'Experience in networking areas: Linux, software-defined networking, network virtualization, open protocols, application acceleration and load balancing, DNS, VPN and their application to PaaS and IaaS technologies.', 'Experience with large-scale deployments, developing scalable architectures using API management, microservice frameworks, PaaS and container orchestration systems.', 'This role may also be located in our Playa Vista, CA campus.', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Experience with new emerging technologies, methodologies, and solutions in the cloud/IT technology space.', 'Experience with cloud-native software development methodologies and tools to support application development/deployment stages including CI/CD.', " Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience.  Experience with legacy and modern application development, cloud service delivery and deployment. Experience with containers (e.g., Kubernetes, Docker) and associated technologies (e.g., Istio, Envoy). Experience with new emerging technologies, methodologies, and solutions in the cloud/IT technology space. "]

['', ' Data security experience using Voltage encryption tool .', 'Mandatory Skills (Pls. Detail As Much As Possible)', ' Customer definitions of Data Governance Models;', ' Research and testing of new technologies related to data security methods;', ' Understanding of data security issues including Voltage Format-Preserving Encryption and Secure Stateless Tokenization embed protection into the data itself, protecting it anywhere it goes. Strong written and verbal communication skills Ability to work in a flexible work environment on a global team. Assists in the design, implementation, and enforcement of security policies that protect systems and data from access by unauthorized users. Creates procedures for data access, protection, and backup. Investigates security violations and modifies procedures to prevent future incursions. Reviews changes to information systems to ensure compliance with security standards. Inventory preparation and mapping and life cycle of data; Implementation of Information Security and Data Protection programs; Customer definitions of Data Governance Models;', ' This role provides the expertise and knowledge required to support technologies and processes related to protecting the confidentiality and integrity of sensitive data. Responsible for deploying and supporting the Voltage data encryption tool . Responsible for solution optimization / configuration / maintenance / troubleshooting. Documenting and refining program controls and process for a Data Protection initiative. Work with DBAs, data owners and application teams to utilize data security methods such as encryption, tokenization, and data masking to minimize the exposure of sensitive data elements; Serve as an SME for data security. Maintain a thorough understanding of related standards and best practices; Provide support with four or more of the following areas: Data Protection and Privacy Impact Assessment, Data Classification, Information Governance, Enterprise Information Security Strategy, Compliance Monitoring and User Awareness campaign, Data Leakage/Content Monitoring and Filtering, Data Encryption, Data Masking, and Compliance Readiness. job_title: Sales Engineer, Application Modernization, Google Cloud
job_text: ['Remote locations may be available in the following states: Texas, Alabama, Florida, Mississippi, North Carolina, Pennsylvania, and Tennessee.', '', ' Work to identify and qualify business opportunities, understand key customer technical objections and develop a strategy to resolve technical blockers. Provide in-depth enterprise infrastructure/cloud modernization expertise to support the technical relationship with Google’s customers, including product and solution briefings, proof-of-concept work, and partner directly with product management to prioritize solutions impacting customer adoption to Google Cloud.  Guide customers through assessments of their existing legacy application environments, provide recommendations on a prioritization roadmap for application modernization, and identify applications for migration to hybrid-cloud computing models. Structure and execute prototyping workshops to prove out proposed new architectures, develop best practices, and document key blocking requirements for prioritization with engineering. Travel to customer sites, conferences, and other related events as needed. ', 'Experience as a technology consultant, technical architect, technical sales engineer, or solutions architect.', 'About The Job', 'Responsibilities', 'Travel to customer sites, conferences, and other related events as needed.', 'Knowledge of application security patterns including web application security, service mesh and mobile security strategies.', 'Structure and execute prototyping workshops to prove out proposed new architectures, develop best practices, and document key blocking requirements for prioritization with engineering.', 'Experience with legacy and modern application development, cloud service delivery and deployment.', 'Experience with containers (e.g., Kubernetes, Docker) and associated technologies (e.g., Istio, Envoy).', 'Work to identify and qualify business opportunities, understand key customer technical objections and develop a strategy to resolve technical blockers.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience. ", 'Guide customers through assessments of their existing legacy application environments, provide recommendations on a prioritization roadmap for application modernization, and identify applications for migration to hybrid-cloud computing models.', "Master's degree in Computer Science or other technical field.", 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Atlanta, GA, USA; Cambridge, MA, USA; Chicago, IL, USA; Addison, TX, USA; New York, NY, USA; Los Angeles, CA, USA; Seattle, WA, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA; Sunnyvale, CA, USA; Minneapolis, MN, USA', 'Provide in-depth enterprise infrastructure/cloud modernization expertise to support the technical relationship with Google’s customers, including product and solution briefings, proof-of-concept work, and partner directly with product management to prioritize solutions impacting customer adoption to Google Cloud. ', " Master's degree in Computer Science or other technical field. Experience as a technology consultant, technical architect, technical sales engineer, or solutions architect. Experience with cloud-native software development methodologies and tools to support application development/deployment stages including CI/CD. Experience in networking areas: Linux, software-defined networking, network virtualization, open protocols, application acceleration and load balancing, DNS, VPN and their application to PaaS and IaaS technologies. Experience with large-scale deployments, developing scalable architectures using API management, microservice frameworks, PaaS and container orchestration systems. Knowledge of application security patterns including web application security, service mesh and mobile security strategies. ", 'Experience in networking areas: Linux, software-defined networking, network virtualization, open protocols, application acceleration and load balancing, DNS, VPN and their application to PaaS and IaaS technologies.', 'Experience with large-scale deployments, developing scalable architectures using API management, microservice frameworks, PaaS and container orchestration systems.', 'This role may also be located in our Playa Vista, CA campus.', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Experience with new emerging technologies, methodologies, and solutions in the cloud/IT technology space.', 'Experience with cloud-native software development methodologies and tools to support application development/deployment stages including CI/CD.', " Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience.  Experience with legacy and modern application development, cloud service delivery and deployment. Experience with containers (e.g., Kubernetes, Docker) and associated technologies (e.g., Istio, Envoy). Experience with new emerging technologies, methodologies, and solutions in the cloud/IT technology space. "]

improvement experience including measurement of value and benefits achieved.', '5+ years’ experience with Department of Defense 8500.01: Cybersecurity; DoD Instruction 8510.01 Risk Management process.5+ year’s experience working with and applying internal control general computer control and risk management-based frameworks (e.g., COBIT, ISO 27001, NIST Special Publications 800-37: Guide for Applying the Risk Management Framework to Federal Information Systems; 800-53: Security and Privacy Controls for Federal Information Systems and Organizations; 800-171: Protecting Controlled Unclassified Information in Nonfederal Systems and Organizations).5+ years’ process and program improvement experience including measurement of value and benefits achieved.Relevant certification(s) (e.g., CRISC, CISM, CISSP, CAP, Sec+, CASP).Experience with Archer or similar governance, risk, and compliance platform/tools.An active security clearance.', 'Lead the IT & Security Federal Compliance Program including but not limited to the identification, management, monitoring, operation, ongoing enhancements, and engineering of compliance requirements to enhance engineer’s ability to adhere to unclassified controlled information (CUI) and financial contract information (FCI) with a particular focus on Defense Federal Acquisition Regulation Supplement (DFARS), Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) and Sarbanes-Oxley IT compliance (SOX).Provide stakeholders day-to-day federal IT and cybersecurity compliance, and SOX thought leadership, oversight with engineering technical reviews and the review of control system artifacts to ensure that cybersecurity and SOX requirements are incorporated early, that the implementation of the requirements is maturing across the acquisition life cycle, and driving controls automation.Set and maintain IT and security federal requirements, milestones, trainings and awareness needs, lead IT compliance change management initiatives to make change stick with engineers for existing applications and infrastructure as well as future needs.Facilitate and support implementation of information security measures and procedures, including the reporting of incidents and appropriate reporting chains and coordinating system-level responses to unauthorized disclosures in accordance with Reference DoD Manual 5200.01, Volume 4, DoD Information Security Program: Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI).Lead or support gap assessments, cybersecurity inspections, tests, control reviews and coordinate mitigation with affected parties.Drive project and program direction, measure and demonstrate program effectiveness, represent program and present results and risks to and influence senior leadership.Inspire the team and foster a workgroup environment of collaboration, excellence and efficiency.', 'Facilitate and support implementation of information security measures and procedures, including the reporting of Program: Controlled Unclassified Information (CUI).', 'Requirements', 'Preferred Qualifications', '5+ years’ experience driving large, complex security and IT or engineering compliance programs for a federal program or federal entity with a particular focus and subject matter expertise around Defense Federal Acquisition Regulation Supplement (DFARS), Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) and/or Sarbanes-Oxley IT compliance.', 'An active security clearance.', '5+ years’ experience driving large, complex security and IT or engineering compliance programs for a federal program or federal entity with a particular focus and subject matter expertise around Defense Federal Acquisition Regulation Supplement (DFARS), Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) and/or Sarbanes-Oxley IT compliance.3+ years’ experience with Azure or similar cloud-based services for enterprise or federal stakeholders / entities.3+ years’ experience influencing middle management and senior leadership through delivering excellent verbal and written communications.The successful candidate must be a U.S. Citizen.Citizenship Verification: This position requires verification of US Citizenship to meet federal government security requirements.3+ years’ experience as a strong cross group collaborator and team player, dealing with ambiguity and complex problems, and resolving conflict.', 'Qualifications', 'Drive project and program direction, measure and demonstrate program effectiveness, represent program and present results and risks to and influence senior leadership.', 'Set and maintain IT and security federal requirements, milestones, trainings and awareness needs, lead IT compliance change management initiatives to make change stick with engineers for existing applications and infrastructure as well as future needs.', '3+ years’ experience as a strong cross group collaborator and team player, dealing with ambiguity and complex problems, and resolving conflict.', '5+ years’ experience with Department of Defense 8500.01: Cybersecurity; DoD Instruction 8510.01 Risk Management Framework for DoD Information Technology; DoD 8582.01: Security of non-DoD Information Systems Processing Unclassified Nonpublic DoD Information; and the Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification process.', 'Responsibilities will include: ', 'Experience with Archer or similar governance, risk, and compliance platform/tools.', 'Required Qualifications:', 'The successful candidate must be a U.S. Citizen.Citizenship Verification: This position requires verification of US Citizenship to meet federal government security requirements.', 'Provide stakeholders day-to-day federal IT and cybersecurity compliance, and SOX thought leadership, oversight with engineering technical reviews and the review of control system artifacts to ensure that cybersecurity and SOX requirements are incorporated early, that the implementation of the requirements is maturing across the acquisition life cycle, and driving controls automation.', 'Lead the IT & Security Federal Compliance Program including but not limited to the identification, management, monitoring, operation, ongoing enhancements, and engineering of compliance requirements to enhance engineer’s ability to adhere to unclassified controlled information (CUI) and financial contract information (FCI) with a particular focus on Defense Federal Acquisition Regulation Supplement (DFARS), Cybersecurity Maturity Model Certification (CMMC) and Sarbanes-Oxley IT compliance (SOX).', '3+ years’ experience with Azure or similar cloud-based services for enterprise or federal stakeholders / entities.', '3+ years’ experience influencing middle management and senior leadership through delivering excellent verbal and written communications.']

job_title: Sales Engineer, Application Modernization, Google Cloud
job_text: ['Remote locations may be available in the following states: Texas, Alabama, Florida, Mississippi, North Carolina, Pennsylvania, and Tennessee.', '', ' Work to identify and qualify business opportunities, understand key customer technical objections and develop a strategy to resolve technical blockers. Provide in-depth enterprise infrastructure/cloud modernization expertise to support the technical relationship with Google’s customers, including product and solution briefings, proof-of-concept work, and partner directly with product management to prioritize solutions impacting customer adoption to Google Cloud.  Guide customers through assessments of their existing legacy application environments, provide recommendations on a prioritization roadmap for application modernization, and identify applications for migration to hybrid-cloud computing models. Structure and execute prototyping workshops to prove out proposed new architectures, develop best practices, and document key blocking requirements for prioritization with engineering. Travel to customer sites, conferences, and other related events as needed. ', 'Experience as a technology consultant, technical architect, technical sales engineer, or solutions architect.', 'About The Job', 'Responsibilities', 'Travel to customer sites, conferences, and other related events as needed.', 'Knowledge of application security patterns including web application security, service mesh and mobile security strategies.', 'Structure and execute prototyping workshops to prove out proposed new architectures, develop best practices, and document key blocking requirements for prioritization with engineering.', 'Experience with legacy and modern application development, cloud service delivery and deployment.', 'Experience with containers (e.g., Kubernetes, Docker) and associated technologies (e.g., Istio, Envoy).', 'Work to identify and qualify business opportunities, understand key customer technical objections and develop a strategy to resolve technical blockers.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience. ", 'Guide customers through assessments of their existing legacy application environments, provide recommendations on a prioritization roadmap for application modernization, and identify applications for migration to hybrid-cloud computing models.', "Master's degree in Computer Science or other technical field.", 'Preferred Qualifications', 'Atlanta, GA, USA; Cambridge, MA, USA; Chicago, IL, USA; Addison, TX, USA; New York, NY, USA; Los Angeles, CA, USA; Seattle, WA, USA; San Francisco, CA, USA; Sunnyvale, CA, USA; Minneapolis, MN, USA', 'Provide in-depth enterprise infrastructure/cloud modernization expertise to support the technical relationship with Google’s customers, including product and solution briefings, proof-of-concept work, and partner directly with product management to prioritize solutions impacting customer adoption to Google Cloud. ', " Master's degree in Computer Science or other technical field. Experience as a technology consultant, technical architect, technical sales engineer, or solutions architect. Experience with cloud-native software development methodologies and tools to support application development/deployment stages including CI/CD. Experience in networking areas: Linux, software-defined networking, network virtualization, open protocols, application acceleration and load balancing, DNS, VPN and their application to PaaS and IaaS technologies. Experience with large-scale deployments, developing scalable architectures using API management, microservice frameworks, PaaS and container orchestration systems. Knowledge of application security patterns including web application security, service mesh and mobile security strategies. ", 'Experience in networking areas: Linux, software-defined networking, network virtualization, open protocols, application acceleration and load balancing, DNS, VPN and their application to PaaS and IaaS technologies.', 'Experience with large-scale deployments, developing scalable architectures using API management, microservice frameworks, PaaS and container orchestration systems.', 'This role may also be located in our Playa Vista, CA campus.', 'Minimum Qualifications', 'Experience with new emerging technologies, methodologies, and solutions in the cloud/IT technology space.', 'Experience with cloud-native software development methodologies and tools to support application development/deployment stages including CI/CD.', " Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or equivalent practical experience.  Experience with legacy and modern application development, cloud service delivery and deployment. Experience with containers (e.g., Kubernetes, Docker) and associated technologies (e.g., Istio, Envoy). Experience with new emerging technologies, methodologies, and solutions in the cloud/IT technology space. "]

small projects and for occasional larger complex projects.']

['', 'Experience and ability to write technical documentation', 'Development and execution of technology roadmaps to insert new technologies in these engineering test environments.', 'Design and implementation of hardware, firmware and software to perform real-time and closed-loop operation with the weapon’s hardware and software.', 'Systems engineering experience', 'Specific Responsibilities Include', 'Requires a Degree in Science, Technology, Engineering or Mathematics STEM ', 'Requires a minimum of two (2) years of prior relevant experience with emphasis in mechanical design, analysis, and integration', 'Required Education, Sills And Experience', 'Experience creating engineering estimates for work to be performed', 'Excellent communication skills/presentation skills and the ability to work cohesively in a diverse environment', 'Familiarity with electrical hardware design', 'Preparation and release of the environment’s Technical Data Package (TDP), and verification of requirements, acceptance test and delivery of the equipment (ATP/TRB).', 'Experience with Common PDM (or similar configuration management database), with knowledge of drawing release cycles (Engineering Review Board & Control Change Board)', 'Demonstrated proficiency applying geometric dimensioning and tolerancing methods', 'U.S. Citizenship status is required as this position needs an active U.S. Security Clearance as of day one of employment.', 'Job Description:', 'Expertise in mechanical design, subsystems packaging, thermal and structural analysis', 'Two (2) or more years of experience with ProE/CREO Parametric or comparable CAD modeling software', 'Self-starter, able to manage time and resources to meet assigned deadlines', 'Desired Skills and Experience: ', 'Ability to lead a small group of engineers']

job_title: Electrical Engineer II / Sr. Electrical Engineer I - Power Design
job_text: ['', 'This position can be an Electrical Engineer II or Sr. Electrical Engineer I based upon the applicant’s qualifications as they relate to the skills, experience and responsibility requirements of the position.', 'Guide Electronic Computer-Aided Design (ECAD) personnel through PWB layout of power circuitry and technical drawing creation.', 'Security:', 'Experience with performing circuit card assembly-level power architecture trades, and/or with system-level power architecture trades, including power converter specification development experience.', 'Experience with military specifications.', 'REQUIRED EDUCATION', 'U.S. citizenship status is required as this position needs an active U.S. Security Clearance within 1 year of start date.', 'Leadership experience.', 'Professional or academic experience with design, analysis, and/or test experience with analog electronic design and analysis, including FET, BJT, and Op-amp circuits.', 'Strong teaming skills, and good communication skills and customer focused.', 'Desired Skills/Experience', 'Self-starter, a quick learner, ability to function in a dynamic environment with good time management skills.', 'Design experience with Electro-Magnetic Interference (EMI) concerns.', 'Design, analysis, and/or test experience with any of the following isolated converter topologies: flyback, half-bridge, full-bridge, and/or push-pull. Design scope will ideally include stability.', 'Design experience with voltages > 400V and/or power > 10kW.', 'Experience with transformer and inductor design considerations.', 'Required Skills/Experience', 'Experience with program management tools such as Earned Value.', 'Experience with acting as a liaison between program and functional management.', 'Professional or academic experience guiding Electronic Computer-Aided Design (ECAD) personnel through PWB layout of power circuitry and technical drawing creation (direct experience with such tools is adequate to fulfill this requirement).', 'Familiarity with circuit simulator SIMPLIS and/or analysis tool Mathcad.', 'Perform design work within the bounds of a given schedule.', 'Must be able to design to meet concerns of adjacent disciplines, such as thermal, structural, mechanical, reliability, and quality.', 'Experience with digital power control.', 'Job Description/Responsibilities', 'Experience with Mentor Graphics DxDesigner, and/or Hyperlynx.', 'Experience with proposal development.']

Clearance must be active at time of hire.', 'Responsibilities', 'Extracts engineering information from CAD drawings.', 'Proficiency with Microsoft tools (e.g., MS Word, Project, PowerPoint)', 'Completes a variety of assignments such as drawings, specifications, and other materials suitable for procurement and DoD purposes. Frequently interfaces with other Engineering disciplines as well as other departments.', 'Prepares and issues specifications, data sheets, and other DoD documents.', 'Prepares detailed requisitions for equipment and materials.', 'Familiarity with DoD programs', 'Electrical Engineer Subject Matter Expert (SME)', 'Performs other responsibilities associated with this position as may be appropriate.', 'Ability to perform with minimal supervision; prioritize tasks', 'Qualifications', 'Proficiency in utilizing CAD and other PC software packages typically associated with engineering is required.', 'Prepares engineering computations, material quantity takeoffs, estimates, surveys, and designs.', 'Provides technical guidance to CAD Designer/Drafters, Designers, and lower-level Engineers working on the same project.', 'This position description does not represent a current opening but may be used to identify candidates with skills and experience for positions within Parsons Corporation. Candidates who express an interest may be considered for future positions at Parsons Corporation.', 'May act in an advisory capacity to senior management personnel on engineering related matters.', 'Reviews supplier drawing submittals and performs technical bid analyses.', 'Preferred/Desired Skills', 'May be required to provide the seal and signature of the professional engineer, as appropriate, ensuring compliance with all applicable codes, regulations, and ordinances.']
